job_title: (3538)Data, ETL and Analytics - Senior Software Engineer
job_text: ["We are an equal opportunity employer and make hiring decisions based on merit. Recruitment, hiring, training, and job assignments are made without regard to race, color, national origin, age, ancestry, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, disability, or any other protected classification. We consider all qualified applicants, including those with criminal histories, in a manner consistent with state and local laws, including the City of Los Angeles'''' Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance.", 'Support the Operations team in capacity planning and performance tuning for large scale systems.', 'Experience in developing high performance and scalable systems ', 'Design and hands-on software development (writing new code) for ETL, enrichment, alerting, and indexing high-rate event streams. ', '4 or more years of hands-on coding experience in Java (mandatory).', "Data, ETL and Analytics (3537) Location Ottawa, Canada Direct HireOur Threat Insight is an enterprise network security product focused on providing capabilities that empower our customers to detect and track adversaries in real-time. Our mission is to use the power of information to detect, track, and dismantle hackers'''' means of attacking our customers. Our team has seen all sides of the equation, as attackers and defenders, in addition to the complex engineering required to solve these problems at scale. Our software helps security professionals get an unparalleled view of their networks, perform forensics on security incidents, and build effective early warning systems. We are looking for Software Engineers to help us solve complex search and pattern matching problems at the petabyte scale. Our data collection needs to operate in near real-time, our data stores need to scale linearly with our datasets, our search needs to perform sub-second matches, our classifiers and behavior analytics need to operate over streaming data sets, and our pattern matching needs to support a variety of operators, window functions, and custom intersection semantics. We work with a number of data storage and processing systems, including MySQL, Postgres, Hadoop, HBasePhoenix, Spark, Elasticsearch, a variety of AWS data services as well as some proprietary systems. Core Job Role", 'Knowledge of monitoring, benchmarking, diagnostic, and performance optimization tools.', 'Implement processes for applying data-analysis algorithms to event-streams.Job Requirements', 'Solid knowledge and understanding of object-oriented programming, data structures, algorithms, software design. Rigor in high code quality, automated testing, and other engineering best practices.', 'Design, implement, build, test, and deploy scalable systems to store, process, and retrieve high-rate event streams.', 'Knowledge and experience with the Hadoop ecosystem Hadoop, HBase, Spark']

In some cases, this role may involve building repeatable data feeds to and from platforms such as, Salesforce, SAP, ecommerce websites, etc. The position requires development skills to enable matching and linking of internal and external data sources using analytical techniques/tools.\xa0It also involves researching against other source data sets, profiling and mapping to those targets.', "5 + years' experience with batch job scheduling and identifying data/job dependencies", 'Highly proficient in database technologies including RDBMS, DW/DL, Cloud, NoSQL', 'This position is also responsible for functioning as the Subject Matter Expert (SME) for Snowflake cloud database development although will also need to operate across other source systems/technologies (e.g., Salesforce, SAP, AS400, Oracle, MySQL, etc.). This individual will work very closely with the other members of the team to build and maintain different zones of the Snowflake data lake environment. Partnering with the existing Data Analytics and Insights team, they will determine the optimal approach for extracting, transforming and loading data into different zones of Snowflake data lake (Raw/Native, Processed/Transformed, Enriched, Archive). This includes design and development to prepare data for movement storage & consumption, views, ETL processes, extracts and other processes that manipulate, error trap, aggregate, clean, or enrich the data.', '1+ years’ experience with Snowflake cloud-based database.', 'Ability to maintain technical proficiency', 'Title - Analytics Engineer', 'Self-motivated/self-starter', 'Wiley is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other legally protected characteristics.', 'Perform source data analysis and qualification for inclusion into the Operations Data Lake', 'Strong understanding of various data formats such as CSV, XML, JSON, etc.', 'Experience with at least one statistical or scripting language/tool such as Python/R/SAS/SPSS']

technologies ', 'Support Data Quality Program: work with Data QA Engineer to identify automated QA checks and associated monitoring & alerting to ensure the platform maintains consistently high-quality data ', ' Optomi, in partnership with a leading technology consulting company, is seeking a Data Engineer to fulfill a contract opportunity with a client based out of Dallas, TX. ['', 'A STEM degree (recent graduates) AND/OR 5 + years experience working with Python/Django.Solid knowledge of programming fundamentals - algorithms, data structures, design patterns, and paradigmsExpert knowledge of web development with a deep understanding of inner workings of major browsers, including how they render HTML/CSS and their Javascript runtime environmentProven problem-solving and fast-learning skills', 'Health&Life insurance with dental and vision plan401k matchingPaid holidays, vacation and sick daysPaid lunches', 'Solid knowledge of programming fundamentals - algorithms, data structures, design patterns, and paradigms', 'Health&Life insurance with dental and vision plan', 'What will you do:\xa0', 'Perks&Benefits:', 'This includes working on features that are supported across all major web browsers, mobile devices, smart TVs, and video consoles. As a backend engineer, it is expected to work with large data sets and being an expert in designing efficient algorithms, queries, and caching methods.', 'Benefits', 'A STEM degree (recent graduates) AND/OR 5 + years experience working with Python/Django.', 'Paid holidays, vacation and sick days', 'The platform is built on Python/Django framework with TypeScript on the front-end. Some parts of the platform use Java, Golang, and Rust.', 'Would be nice to have:\xa0be familiar with other programming languages such as Java, Go, Rust.', 'What will you bring:', 'What are we doing:\xa0', 'How we build the product:', 'Our sophisticated system has multiple parts, including but not limited to payment gateways, live chats, and video streaming technology. Every contribution here is of high impact and affects the experience of millions of users using the site every day.', 'We always explore new ways to use cutting-edge tech stack and move toward modern micro-services based architecture.', '401k matching', 'Requirements', 'We value an initiative and are willing to support you in making appropriate technical decisions.', 'Expert knowledge of web development with a deep understanding of inner workings of major browsers, including how they render HTML/CSS and their Javascript runtime environment', 'We are a tech company, operating a thriving and growing broadcast platform, Alexa ranked in the top 100 sites internationally, and the top 25 in the United States, with approximately 10 million daily users, and a worldwide community of fans. Independent Broadcasters use our platform to create and share live streaming video, photographs, and similar content, generally adult in nature, (but no adult content is required).', 'You will work in a very dynamic environment and have an opportunity to work on different parts of the platform.', 'Paid lunches', 'What are we doing:', 'Proven problem-solving and fast-learning skills', 'How we build the product:\xa0', 'Mainly, you will be participating in brainstorming to figure out the best technical solutions to achieve the goals set by the management. As a top-notch software engineer in our team, you will be accountable for building comprehensive technical solutions with high-quality standards and practicing clean coding styles. The day-to-day tasks may include building new features for the site, fixing existing bugs, and refactoring/optimizing existing code to deliver the best consumer experience for both users and broadcasters worldwide.']

(Preferred with Non-DoD Agencies) ', 'One or more programming languages (Java, C, C++, XML, python, perl, Shell scripting, PL SQL) ', 'Big Data and Hadoop ', 'Oracle 11g, 12c, 18c RDBMS ', 'ETL, ODI, EDQ, Hyperion, Web Center Content, IDAM, technologies ', 'Oracle Labeling Technologies (Oracle Label Security, Database Vault) ', 'Experience as a contractor in the Intelligence Community. (Preferred with Non-DoD Agencies) Technical expertise and hands on experience as a software developer, software engineer with knowledge for applying these skills to cloud, data and analytics, cyber security, and customer mission challenges. Experience or training with variety of Oracle technologies including the applicability and usage of these technologies by customers. Passion for technology, the curiosity and willingness to constantly learn new skills, work with new tools and discover new and innovative approaches to solving complex technical challenges. Hands on experience as a software developer / engineer with languages such as Java/JEE, C++, XML, perl, PL SQL, Python. Hands on experience implementing middleware technology such as WebLogic, Apache Tomcat on Linux and Windows. Experience in implementing systems in AWS or other Cloud environments. The ability to articulate technical concepts to non-technical audiences and, vice versa, translate functional needs to technical solutions ', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Experience with RDBMS (prefer Oracle) ', 'Oracle Engineered Systems', 'Experience with any of the following is an added bonus: ', 'The ability to articulate technical concepts to non-technical audiences and, vice versa, translate functional needs to technical solutions ', 'One or more programming languages (Java, C, C++, XML, python, perl, Shell scripting, PL SQL) Linux or Solaris experience Experience with RDBMS (prefer Oracle) Experience with one or more application servers (WebLogic, Tomcat, JBoss) ', 'The Oracle National Security Group is seeking consultants that have a passion for software development and/or DevOps that can support a number of exciting internal Oracle and customer facing engagements. Those who excel in this role are motivated self-starters who love to solve challenging problems and feel comfortable working directly with customers, as well as, on innovative internal development efforts. This role is an integral part of an elite team with diverse skill sets that designs and delivers unique solutions that integrate a wide variety of Oracle commercial hardware, software, and cloud into secure, mission critical solutions for our government customers. As part of the consulting team, you will have the opportunity to work across multiple projects and customers, share your knowledge and insights, learn the latest and greatest technology innovations, and have the freedom and autonomy to put your creative technical talents to work. ', 'About Our Team: ', 'Passion for technology, the curiosity and willingness to constantly learn new skills, work with new tools and discover new and innovative approaches to solving complex technical challenges. ', 'Hands on experience as a software developer / engineer with languages such as Java/JEE, C++, XML, perl, PL SQL, Python. ', 'Preferred Qualifications: ', ':', 'Oracle PaaS (Describe specific experience) ', 'Oracle’s National Security Group (NSG) is a business unit dedicated to providing technologies to the Intelligence Community (IC), Department of Defense (DoD) and to the Military Intelligence. Oracle leads the world in transforming data into actionable information and insights and Oracle NSG’s Consulting Practice tailors Oracle commercial products to meet the most demanding requirements of the United States Government’s sensitive missions. The government relies on Oracle and we rely on our cadre of talented, innovative technologists, developers and engineers to make it all possible. The NSG Consulting Practice is a dynamic team with an inclusive, collaborative environment where each person’s unique experience and talents are valued and promoted. Our group fosters creative, entrepreneurial ideas and strives to implement them to achieve mission impact. We are dedicated to cultivating a passionate workforce comprised of professionals who aspire to grow personally and professionally.\xa0 ', 'Experience with any of the following is an added bonus:', 'Big Data and Hadoop ETL, ODI, EDQ, Hyperion, Web Center Content, IDAM, technologies Oracle 11g, 12c, 18c RDBMS Oracle Labeling Technologies (Oracle Label Security, Database Vault) Oracle or AWS Cloud Oracle PaaS (Describe specific experience) Oracle Engineered Systems', 'Experience with one or more application servers (WebLogic, Tomcat, JBoss) ', 'Oracle or AWS Cloud ', 'Linux or Solaris experience ', '\xa0 ', 'Experience or training with variety of Oracle technologies including the applicability and usage of these technologies by customers. ', 'Hands on experience implementing middleware technology such as WebLogic, Apache Tomcat on Linux and Windows. ', 'Our environment not only encourages you to learn new, emerging technologies to expand your skill set; it also provides you with opportunity to share your knowledge with our team of elite professionals. Skill or experience in any of the following technologies is highly desired: ', 'Experience in implementing systems in AWS or other Cloud environments. ', 'Technical expertise and hands on experience as a software developer, software engineer with knowledge for applying these skills to cloud, data and analytics, cyber security, and customer mission challenges. ['', 'www.drip.com/about', 'Drip is the world’s first ecommerce CRM (ECRM) that enables retailers to build personal and profitable relationships with their customers at scale. We believe the world needs specialty retail and Drip is the platform that enables competition with the impersonal ecommerce giants. We are well-funded, growing super fast, and building a beautiful product. We have offices in Minneapolis and Greater Salt Lake City.', 'Goals for you!', 'We use a variety of different technologies to best meet the needs of our customers. While our code runs in AWS, we deploy and manage services written in Ruby, Go, Python, and Scala (just to name a few). Our frontend team loves building user experiences in Elm, while our backend team likes to build microservices (Dockerized on ECS) that scale to thousands of requests per second. For data, we share the love for both relational and NoSQL databases: PostgreSQL, DyanamoDB, Redshift, and Athena. Monitoring, operational excellence, and testing are important to all of us as we continually strive to improve.', 'You’re a self-starting engineer who loves technology! \xa0You have experience in building either complex SaaS applications or B2C sites; ideally both, as our Drip engineering team stretches in both directions. You also have experience architecting scalable applications including microservices. Sound like you?', 'About the opportunity', 'Want to positively impact tens of thousands of passionate users and marketing professionals around the globe? \xa0Join Drip! ', 'Your Profile', 'About the tech stack', 'As a Software Engineer at Drip, you’ll be part of a small, agile product team that is working to solve some of the industry’s most interesting technical challenges. You’ll collaborate cross-functionally as you design, build, and ship production features for our cloud-native ECRM application. In addition to gaining experience in a rapidly evolving SaaS start-up, you’ll have a tremendous impact on the product: literally shaping and defining this new CRM vertical.', '...completed a comprehensive onboarding plan where you’ll get to know all of the key leaders, understand how the Company, Customer, Product, and People machines work \xa0and have a deep knowledge of our strategy and product (this will happen quickly!)', '...ownership of major features of the product', '...had a major, visible, impact on our product in a way that directly and tangibly impacts our customers', 'Our goal is to be successful at the company and individual level. \xa0Within 180 days of being at Drip, you will have...', '...deep familiarity with our tech stack and codebase through pair programming and immediately owning a feature']

['', 'Working Conditions: Works in a normal office setting with no exposure to adverse environmental conditions. Provide on-call support for database application and layered products as needed. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Collaborate with business partners to productionize, optimize, and scale enterprise analytics. ', 'The Sr. Big Data Engineer manages the uninterrupted flow of information by designing and maintaining data pipelines to deliver data across our organization. S/he builds the automated data pipelines to ingest and prepare the data to meet the reporting and analytics needs of the organization. This includes building and maintaining the data structures and architectures for data ingestion, processing and deployment for large-scale, data-intensive applications. This individual must ensure that optimal ETL (Extract, Transformation, and Load) solutions are developed by applying best practices to the data modeling, code development and automation. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Keen attention to detail and ability to access impact of design changes prior to implementation ', '\xa0', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Collaborate with data architects and modelers on data store designs and best practices ', ' ', 'Position Summary ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ability to present and explain technical information to diverse types of audiences in a way that establishes rapport and gains understanding ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++ ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Thorough understanding of relational, columnar and NoSQL database architectures and industry best practices for development ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Self-driven, highly motivated and ability to learn quick ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work experience with geospatial data and spatial analytics is preferred ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Excellent advanced SQL coding and performance tuning skills ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Understanding of agile development methodologies ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 As part of an agile team, design, develop and maintain an optimal data pipeline architecture using both structured data sources and big data for both on-premise and cloud-based environments. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 At least two (2) years Data engineering experience on the Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), or Snowflake ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with parsing data formats such as XML/JSON and leveraging external APIs ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills; ability to weigh various suggested technical solutions against the original business needs and choose the most cost-effective solution ', 'Position Title: Sr Big Data Engineer \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ', 'Other Skills/Abilities ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Science, Math or related discipline ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Participate in requirements gathering sessions to distill technical requirements from business requests. ', '\xa0 ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop and automate ETL code using scripting languages, ETL tools and job scheduling software to support all reporting and analytical data needs. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data pipeline performance, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability and access to information. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong customer service orientation ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Provide off-hours support for all developed data pipelines in an on-call rotation. ', 'Education/Certifications ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Design and build dimensional data models to support the data warehouse initiatives. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Understanding of dimensional data modeling for designing and building data warehouses ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ability to work in a team-oriented, collaborative environment; good interpersonal skills ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience using Extract, Transformation and Load (ETL) tools with Informatica (IICS) to build automated data pipelines ', 'Experience/Minimum Requirements ', 'Essential Job Functions ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Assemble large, complex data sets that meet the analytical needs of the data scientist teams. ['', 'Back End:', 'engineering at HubSpot', "By submitting your application, you agree that HubSpot may collect your personal data for recruiting, global organization planning, and related purposes. Front End: Our web applications are complex, single-page apps written in JavaScript (React, ECMAScript 6, Sass). Core Data, Infrastructure, & Reliability: Building the systems that power thousands of services with Singularity on Apache Mesos, and empowering access to massive datasets with HBase, Elastic Search, ZooKeeper, Redis, MySQL, and Memcached. ', 'A proven track record of fearlessly designing, deploying, and evolving ETL solutions to meet business requirements via creating SQL and Stored Proc best practices for a specific platform. ', 'Experience building rock solid relational databases solutions along with designing, implementing, testing, migrating, deploying, and managing ETL solutions: Core functional ETL processing (extract transform, and load). ['', 'We have a fantastic location in a sunny office in downtown San Francisco, easily commutable from anywhere in the Bay Area by BART and MUNI', 'YOUR DAY TO DAY', 'Our engineers are generalists, and your responsibilities will be flexible based on company needs as well as your skills and interests.', 'Meteor / Semantic UI / MongoDBMicroservice architecture / Docker / AWSLocal copy of full production stack for developmentGitHub for version control and pull requests', 'We have a collaborative culture where engineers mentor each other', 'You have made key architectural decisions for large projects.', 'We are hiring entrepreneurial engineers interested in being a part of our scaling engineering team. Our engineers are conscientious hackers who like teamwork but are also comfortable with independent projects. Our engineering team releases new software every week, moves at a fast pace, and works directly with our design and customer-facing teams to imagine and build the new experiences our customers love. Because of that, you’ll get a rewarding variety of projects to work on.', 'Qualia’s Head of Design, Jack Lukic, is the creator of Semantic UI, one of the most popular open-source design frameworks. Qualia engineers learn this framework, and design patterns more generally, directly from the creator of the framework our front end is built on! Very few companies can say that.', 'ABOUT OUR ENGINEERING TEAM', 'Our flat company structure empowers engineers to make product decisionsWe have a collaborative culture where engineers mentor each otherOur team members take time to eat together and share conversation at our daily catered lunchesWe have a fantastic location in a sunny office in downtown San Francisco, easily commutable from anywhere in the Bay Area by BART and MUNIWe offer generous compensation and benefits packages including medical, vision, and dental insurance and a flexible PTO policy', 'At Qualia, we are fundamentally transforming the way real estate professionals, lenders, and homebuyers manage real estate transactions, one of the nation’s largest industries. We are bringing together everyone involved in the closing process onto one shared, secure platform -- basically, we’re making buying a home in America easier, safer, cheaper, and less painful by moving the process online! Qualia was founded in 2015 by Forbes 30 Under 30 Award recipients Nate Baker, Joel Gottsegen and Lucas Hansen. The company is backed by top investors including 8VC, Bienville Capital, Menlo Ventures and Tiger Global and currently processes 15% of all US real estate transactions. Qualia is headquartered in San Francisco, CA and has offices in Austin, TX.', 'Our flat company structure empowers engineers to make product decisions', 'YOUR BACKGROUND THAT LIKELY MAKES YOU A MATCH', 'We value engineers who have good product sense, attention to detail, and passion for the impact of the software they build.', 'You have mentored junior developers.', "THE TECH STACK YOU'LL USE", "As a Senior Software Engineer, you've been in the industry for a while and have a proven track record of success. You are comfortable taking full responsibility for complex, high-liability projects. You have experience making key architectural decisions and performing the research to back up those decisions. You've dealt with the consequences of your mistakes, and know how to fight fires if necessary. You enjoy mentoring and providing support for less experienced developers. You've thrived in many different environments and realize that each team is unique.", 'Our engineering team demonstrates and values technical thought leadership.Qualia hosts the official Meteor Developer’s Night in our San Francisco HQ, which is the largest gathering of Meteor developers in the world. The event features talks on Meteor and Javascript development generally, often including talks from Qualia team members.Qualia’s Head of Design, Jack Lukic, is the creator of Semantic UI, one of the most popular open-source design frameworks. Qualia engineers learn this framework, and design patterns more generally, directly from the creator of the framework our front end is built on! Very few companies can say that.As part of our focus on continual learning and development, a Qualia team member gives an educational talk on something they’re interested in every Thursday to the entire engineering and product team. Topics range from Kolmogorov complexity theory to the definition of art, to models of existential risk.', 'Your work will focus on building web technologies, both frontend and backend. You’ll work on improving and extending our core web applications, diverse software integrations, payment-processing systems, and other exciting new features.', 'We are looking for strong full-stack engineers with 5+ years of experience', 'Qualia hosts the official Meteor Developer’s Night in our San Francisco HQ, which is the largest gathering of Meteor developers in the world. You’ll work on improving and extending our core web applications, diverse software integrations, payment-processing systems, and other exciting new features.Our engineers are generalists, and your responsibilities will be flexible based on company needs as well as your skills and interests.', 'Local copy of full production stack for development', 'Meteor / Semantic UI / MongoDB', 'We offer generous compensation and benefits packages including medical, vision, and dental insurance and a flexible PTO policy', 'We are looking for strong full-stack engineers with 5+ years of experienceWe value engineers who have good product sense, attention to detail, and passion for the impact of the software they build.You have made key architectural decisions for large projects.You have mentored junior developers.You have worked on multiple engineering teams, both small and large.']

['', 'ManpowerGroup is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE/AA)', 'selva.kumar@experis.com', 'Details:', 'Location:', 'Job Title:', 'Please forward updated resume in word format to Selva - selva.kumar@experis.com', 'Selva - selva.kumar@experis.com', "We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our technology team to solve exciting business problems in the domain of commercial banking, payments and financial services. Candidates must have a strong curiosity for data and a proven track record of successfully applying rigorous scientific methods with proficiency in data science knowledge and technical capabilities. This is a unique opportunity to apply your skills and have a direct impact on global business. The ideal candidate will have a strong knowledge of ML, NLP, Deep Learning, Knowledge Graphs and have experience working with massive amounts of data. They should also have strong software engineering skills and the ability to build systems that reach JP Morgan scale.What You'll Do: Develop and Train production grade ML models on large-scale datasets to solve various business usecases for Commercial Banking. Use large scale data processing frameworks such as Spark, AWS EMR, and be proficient at feature engineering across various data sets both structured and un-structured. Use Deep Learning models like CNN, RNN and NLP (BERT) for solving various business usecases like name entity resolution, forecasting and anomaly detection. Ability to build ML models across Public and Private clouds including container-based Kubernetes environments.  Work with cross-functional teams to test, implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendations  Collaborate with data, design, product and engineering teams to drive effective ML workflows.Basic Qualifications: Advanced Degree in field of Computer Science, Data Science or equivalent engineering discipline.  Minimum 2-3 years of working experience as a data scientist Expertise with Python Advanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data sets Experience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)  Relevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science", 'Duration:', 'Visa:', ' ', 'Only US citizen/GC holders. No OPT, CPT OR EAD', 'Details:Job Title: Data ScientistDuration: 6+ month contract to hireLocation: Chicago IL Visa: Only US citizen/GC holders. No OPT, CPT OR EAD']

['', 'You possess excellent SQL/relational algebra skills, ideally with at least a basic knowledge of how different types of databases (e.g.: column vs row storage) work.', ' We work on problems that affect the lives of real people. We are a data-driven company through and through. We’re a respectful, diverse, and dynamic environment in which Engineering is a first-class citizen, and where you’ll be able to work on a variety of interesting problems that affect the lives of real people. We offer a generous budget for personal development expenses like training courses, conferences, and books. You’ll get three weeks’ paid vacation and a flexible work policy that is remote- and family-friendly (about 50% of our engineering team is fully remote). We worry about results, not time spent in seats. ', 'We base our work on scientifically-proven, peer-reviewed methodologies that are designed by medical professionals.', 'What We’ll Like About You', 'You’ll get three weeks’ paid vacation and a flexible work policy that is remote- and family-friendly (about 50% of our engineering team is fully remote). ['', 'Duties & Responsibilities', '\ufeffRequired:', 'Position Summary', "Millennium Engineering and Integration is seeking a Systems Engineer at NASA's Kennedy Space Center. Founded in 1995, Millennium Engineering is a Veteran Owned Small Business (VOSB) delivering superb engineering services and solutions to our government and commercial customers. With a singular focus on customer satisfaction, we have established ourselves as one of the nation’s premiere multidisciplinary engineering services and solution providers serving the U.S. Government and commercial industries. With 20-years of stellar performance, we are known as trusted technical and engineering advisor, systems engineering and integration (SE&I) contractor, and solutions provider for our customers in the space, defense, cyber, intelligence, aviation, and healthcare markets. This position is contingent upon award.", '•Experience applying systems engineering principles to design and development of spacecraft systems.', 'BS, Engineering or related discipline', '•3-10 years of experience', "Desired Experience: Previous or current experience/knowledge with NASA's Commercial Crew Program or NASA's Launch Services Program.", 'Skills', "Millennium offers a comprehensive benefits package. Millennium is An Equal Opportunity / Affirmative Action Employer. Millennium does not discriminate on any basis prohibited by applicable law including race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, age, citizenship status, or Vietnam era or special disabled veteran's status in recruitment, employment, promotion, compensation, benefits, or training. It is also Millennium's policy to maintain a work environment free from discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation.", 'Millennium participates in the E-Verify program.', '\xa0', 'Desired Experience:', '•Responsible to participate in and contribute to requirements and design reviews, verify closure of open actions before launch, and provide real-time and post-flight engineering data analysis.']

At this position, you should be able to make judgments and recommendations based on the analysis and interpretation of data.\xa0', 'Great communication and presentation skills. Proven ability to present progress made by the team to senior business management and the project stakeholders.', 'You will use your expertise to design data science models and frameworks, data processing pipelines, and lead efforts of the ML models productization.', 'Learn & stay current on developments in one or more analytics domains: Optimization, Machine Learning, Deep Learning / AI, Simulation, etc.', 'Professional development opportunities', 'Practical skills in usage of big data technologies and tools including Hadoop, MapReduce, Hive, Spark.', 'Experience with look-alike modeling and sequential-input models, RNNs (LSTM, GRU, etc.)', 'We offer:', 'About Us:', 'Familiarity with cloud ML Platforms (Google AI Platform, Amazon Sagemaker, MS Azure AI Platform) is a plus.', 'Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team', 'Grid Dynamics is the engineering services company known for transformative, mission-critical cloud solutions for retail, finance and technology sectors.', 'Benefits program', 'Lead a team of skilled data scientists and data engineers\xa0Plan the R&D process to fit sprint goals as well as the project milestones.Design a new solution architecture for customers clusterization, NLP, and prediction analysis.Drive the collection, cleaning, processing, and analysis of new and existing data sources.Lead ML models development using Python/Tensorflow/Keras/Spark stack.Communicate with business stakeholders to clarify their requirements and present the teamwork results.Learn & stay current on developments in one or more analytics domains: Optimization, Machine Learning, Deep Learning / AI, Simulation, etc.', 'Corporate social events', 'Understanding of and experience with customer intelligence & marketing domains a plus.', 'You will use project management skills to manage the deliverables and ensure all stakeholder work is complete on time. You will also manage stakeholder communications and present your project across a wide spectrum of management levels.', 'Lead a team of skilled data scientists and data engineers\xa0', 'Drive the collection, cleaning, processing, and analysis of new and existing data sources.', 'As a leader of the Data Science team, you will run the development of next-generation platforms for customers micro-segmentation, clusterization, behavior analysis, and prediction as well as building up new improved recommendation systems for the customers.']

job_text: ['', 'For consideration, qualified candidates only, submit letter of interest with salary requirements and resume.', 'Qualifications:', '\xa0Perform other duties as assigned', 'Availability to work evenings and weekends on occasion as operational needs and new deployments demand', 'Located in Studio City, CA, the Motion Picture Industry Pension and Health Plans (MPI)\xa0\xa0are multi-employer trust funds established by collective bargaining agreements between various employers and over 30 Unions and Guilds representing employees in the motion picture industry.\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', 'Enterprise-wide system patching', 'Working closely with business units and application developers to develop and implement business processes across the enterprise and with our business partners', '\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Recognized as an Employer of Choice\xa0for its employee-focused work environment, competitive compensation and benefits, MPI is a recipient of the World at Work Seal of Distinction.\xa0\xa0', 'Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Working knowledge of enterprise-wide change management process', 'Local candidates only, relocation assistance is not provided.\xa0\xa0', 'VMWare ESXi, vROps, NSX, vCenter, and Horizon (or similar technologies)', 'Your responsibilities would include:\xa0\xa0', 'Responsibility for daily performance of the enterprise storage system', 'Demonstrated experience with enterprise-class tools and technologies, front-line troubleshooting, and customer support', 'Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience', 'History of managing deployments/rollouts', 'Submissions will be reviewed; only candidates most closely matching the requirements of the position will be contacted.\xa0\xa0', 'MPI offers free employee health, dental, vision and life insurance ($50/month for family coverage), retirement and pension, and generous paid time off.\xa0\xa0', 'About MPI\xa0\xa0', 'Being the first escalation point for technical issues that cannot be solved at the help desk level and be responsible for working these issues to conclusion', 'Located in Studio City, CA', 'Splunk and other logging technologies', 'Experience working with vendor technical support and professional services', 'Excellent attendance and reliability, with the ability to work overtime/extended hours as required', "Prime responsibility for MPI's fibre-channel storage area network, attached Pure storage, and our Commvault backup system", 'Recognized as an Employer of Choice', 'Previous experience conducting a daily systems operation process to ensure systems retain high\xad-availability and to prevent issues before they occur', 'Experience implementing, managing, maintaining, and operating the following technologies: Microsoft (MS) Windows servers: 2008 -2016 MS Active Directory for enterprises with 400+identities', 'Submissions will be reviewed; only candidates most closely matching the requirements of the position will be contacted.\xa0', 'MPI does not file visa petitions or sponsor applicants for work visas in this job classification.\xa0\xa0', 'We have an immediate opening for a\xa0Systems Engineer\xa0where your primary responsibility is the\xa0hands-on\xa0daily operations of MPI’s IT systems, with special attention given to storage and backup solutions. This includes a fully virtualized compute environment, a secondary off-site data center, Microsoft Windows enterprise management, and other typical enterprise IT technologies.\xa0']

['', '• Good problem solving and analysis skills.\xa0', 'You will also be developing scalable products for cloud platforms, such as Google Cloud and on device AIoT.', 'As C++ Developer / C++ Software Engineer at our company you will be responsible for participating in the full development life cycle of edge device and back-end systems, helping design innovative new products, planning and writing code and creating Unit tests.You will be responsible for the engineering and creation of solutions enabling AI models on edge devices and connecting these with the cloud.Our team consists of top Engineers, Scientists and thought leaders internationally - so as a C++ Software Engineer you will have the chance to learn and work in an environment where you will get exposure to cutting edge artificial intelligence techniques.You will also get the opportunity to shape architecture and be influential in applying best practice; using Continuous Integration and TDD.You will also be developing scalable products for cloud platforms, such as Google Cloud and on device AIoT.', '• A Computer Science degree or related technical field or equivalent practical experience.\xa0', '• An ability to collaborate within an Agile team and communicate effectively.\xa0', 'You will be responsible for the engineering and creation of solutions enabling AI models on edge devices and connecting these with the cloud.', 'We are seeking a software engineer to work on cutting-edge technologies. Position is currently remote, but client is located in Chicago or Holtsville, NY.  Must have experience with C++, Linux and design experience. ', '•Keen to learn – happy to ask questions, eager to push the boundaries – bring their own ideas, delivery focused who also follow requirements.\xa0', '• Experience with parallel-processing on GPUs using CUDA.\xa0', 'REQUIRED SKILLS:\xa0', 'NICE TO HAVE:\xa0', '• A good understanding of algorithms, software architecture and design.\xa0', '• Excellent Object-oriented design principles and data structures\xa0', '• Able to research, design and engineer new solutions and components based on a problem statement /requirement.\xa0', '• Familiar with Agile development methodology.\xa0', 'Our team consists of top Engineers, Scientists and thought leaders internationally - so as a C++ Software Engineer you will have the chance to learn and work in an environment where you will get exposure to cutting edge artificial intelligence techniques.', '• Working knowledge of TDD is essential.\xa0', '-Solid experience of coding in C++11 or newer, multi-threading, parallel-processing, code-optimization, and low-level debugging.\xa0', '• Good experience using GIT or other version control systems.\xa0', '• Keen to take ownership, attention to detail and make a difference\xa0', 'As C++ Developer / C++ Software Engineer at our company you will be responsible for participating in the full development life cycle of edge device and back-end systems, helping design innovative new products, planning and writing code and creating Unit tests.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', '•You must be passionate, pro-active, ambitious and open to learn latest technologies and trends.\xa0', 'You will also get the opportunity to shape architecture and be influential in applying best practice; using Continuous Integration and TDD.', '• Experience with any machine-learning frameworks (OpenVino, TensorFlow, Caffe, Torch).\xa0', '• Experience of scripting using Bash or Python.\xa0', '• Experience of development within Google Cloud.\xa0', '• Strong C++ programming ability - ability to write high quality and maintainable code.\xa0', '• At least 5 years’ experience in commercial environment and full development life cycle and testing.\xa0', '• Experience of MLFlow\xa0', '• Ability to respond under a dynamic work environment with quickly changing priorities\xa0', '• Must be a team player: communicative person who works well as individual as well as part of a team.\xa0']

['Building an inclusive and diverse workplace is one of Underdog.io’s core values. We warmly welcome people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.', "We're looking for a software engineer to join a company in the Underdog.io network.The Underdog.io network is a curated group of some of the fastest growing companies in New York and San Francisco. We actively turn away more than 50% of companies that attempt to join.We accept companies that offer competitive salaries, benefits, and perks. They're working on interesting technical challenges and must be respectful of your time to stay active.Our companies look for software engineers proficient in Python or Java. The ideal candidate is motivated by working on complex technical problems and curious about the world around them. Many of our companies are looking for mid-to-senior level talent, both individual contributors and managers.To apply to the network, we'll ask you to fill out a 60-second web form. It's absolutely free.If accepted, you'll hear directly from founders, hiring managers, and other key decision makers starting the following Monday. Our platform will hide your profile from your current employer. To get started, click through to the link and drop your email.--- "]

['', 'JOB REQUIREMENTS', 'Software engineering background - C#, JavaScript, React, PowerShell, Python are all part of our environmentExperience with Snowflake, dbt, Snowplow, DevOps, Elastic, Spark, StatisticsExperience with data storage technologies outside of our regular stack', 'Software engineering background - C#, JavaScript, React, PowerShell, Python are all part of our environment', "Remote from WA, IL, TX, GA, MD, OR, NV, AZ. ThriftBooks Engineering team is mostly located in Seattle so if you're interested in working in an office atmosphere after COVID, that's where you'll want to be.", 'ABOUT THIS POSITION', 'As an analytics engineer at ThriftBooks, your mission is to make working with data a delightful experience for data consumers. Everything you do aligns with that one mission. Your customers are data scientists, business analysts, and executives.', 'WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT HERE', '3 weeks PTO to start', 'Medical, dental, vision', 'We buy used books that the original owners no longer need. We buy them from libraries and thrift stores and schools. We do this at scale – hundreds of millions of pounds of books per year. We comb through these cast-offs looking for books that we know our customers will love. We add the best books to our inventory. The rest we recycle. We list our inventory on thriftbooks.com where our customers find low-priced books and fantastic customer experience.', 'A love for (and experience with) modeling data. dbt experience a big plus.', 'Manage a cloud-based data warehouse', 'Some experience with BI visualizations - we use Power BI & Mode Analytics', "To accomplish your mission, you will use dbt to deliver well-defined, transformed, tested, documented, and code-reviewed data sets to your data consumers. You'll be applying software engineering best practices to analytics code through version control, testing, and continuous integration.", 'You will be the only analytics engineer and will be working across domains. You will have a lot of latitudes to accomplish your job. You will have daily access to (and support from) senior leadership. You will report to our Director of Data Science but will have tons of interactions outside of your organization. The entire technology team is about 20 people – data scientists, engineers, and IT.', 'Work with nice, fun people', 'Your days will run the gamut of data-related activities:', "ThriftBooks is the world's largest data-driven online second-hand bookstore. That’s a mouthful. Let us explain …", 'We began in 2003 with a small storage unit in Seattle and have grown to over seven million books in seven fulfillment centers across the United States. We are growing rapidly and need your help!', 'Educate and empower your customers to self-serve', 'FREE BOOKS!', 'AutonomyOwnership of the analytics domainCompetitive salary3 weeks PTO to startMedical, dental, vision401kFlexible work schedulesWork with nice, fun peopleFREE BOOKS!', 'Autonomy', 'Flexible work schedules', 'Experience with Snowflake, dbt, Snowplow, DevOps, Elastic, Spark, Statistics', 'Near-obsession with all-things data', 'Experience writing performant SQL on large data sets', "Build and enhance beautifully-crafted data warehouse models with dbtListen to customers as they explain the problems they're trying to solveTroubleshoot data anomalies with engineering teamsBuild visualizations and pull data for peopleEducate and empower your customers to self-serveInvestigate and propose the use of new, relevant technologiesManage a cloud-based data warehouseCraft data requirements for the engineering teams", 'A love for (and experience with) modeling data. dbt experience a big plus.The ability to break large problems into small, testable, deployable solutions Proven track record of delighting data consumer.Experience writing performant SQL on large data setsSome experience with BI visualizations - we use Power BI & Mode AnalyticsNear-obsession with all-things data', 'Competitive salary', 'Craft data requirements for the engineering teams', 'Investigate and propose the use of new, relevant technologies', '401k', 'The ability to break large problems into small, testable, deployable solutions Proven track record of delighting data consumer.', 'Build and enhance beautifully-crafted data warehouse models with dbt', 'Build visualizations and pull data for people', 'LOCATION', 'ABOUT THRIFTBOOKS', "Listen to customers as they explain the problems they're trying to solve", 'NICE TO HAVES', 'Experience with data storage technologies outside of our regular stack', 'Troubleshoot data anomalies with engineering teams', 'Ownership of the analytics domain']

['', 'Job Description:', 'Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Responsibilities:', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0', 'Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0', 'Company Description:', 'General Requirements:', 'Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0', 'Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0', 'Required Skills: SQL, Python, R, data visualization tools', 'Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0', 'Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0', 'Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0', 'Our mission is to inspire kids to love learning. We believe the best way to do that is by linking learning to kids’ interests, connecting them with others who share those interests, and giving them the autonomy to pick their own path. We provide small group classes that meet over live video chat where learners are connected with teachers and classmates who share their interests. These classes are offered through our marketplace and conducted on our remote learning platform.', 'Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0', 'Data plays an important role in how we make decisions. As our second full-time Data team member, you’ll have an opportunity to work cross-functionally with teammates from Operations, Product, Marketing, and other internal teams as they tackle a variety of challenges and opportunities. You’ll help shape our strategy by sharing key insights, digging into some of our most pressing problems, and finding creative ways to use data to improve our products and services.']

as stereo vision, mapping, localization, static, dynamic, and noncooperative obstacle avoidance, sensor fusion, and filtering.', 'Good writing and speaking skills.\xa0You will need to document what Come join our team and help us shape the future of mobile growth!', 'Very strong coding ability (experience in Go and Clojure is a plus).', "At Liftoff, we’re solving one of the core problems faced by every mobile app: growth. ['', 'Qualifications:', 'Prior experience building a large scale platform for web and mobile apps', 'Expertise building complex, distributed services with Python, JavaScript, or Ruby', 'You Will:', 'Speed up our platform so that users can perform their tasks quickly.', 'Become the in-house expert on Rippling customers and competition.', ' Rippling is an equal opportunity employer.', 'About the Role: ', 'Bonus points if you have experience with test automation, using frameworks (Selenium and pytest)', 'Support our increasing customer volume by scaling our platform.', 'Strong CS knowledge', 'Bonus points if you’ve previously worked with AWS', '4+ Years of Professional Work ExperiencePrior experience building a large scale platform for web and mobile appsExpertise building complex, distributed services with Python, JavaScript, or RubyStrong CS knowledgeBonus points if you’ve previously worked with AWSBonus points if you have experience with test automation, using frameworks (Selenium and pytest)', 'Have exposure to the sales teams to prioritize what can improve our revenue.', '4+ Years of Professional Work Experience', 'Interact with customers and support them in being successful with Rippling.', 'Develop high quality software with attention to detail.', 'We’re looking for great software developers to join us in our journey. We care a lot about laying the right infrastructure before building things, but also about continually deploying code. We want to work with exceptional software engineers, who get bored at large companies. We are made up of small teams that move fast.', 'Ship incrementally and continually at high velocity.', 'Support our increasing customer volume by scaling our platform.Speed up our platform so that users can perform their tasks quickly.Develop high quality software with attention to detail.Ship incrementally and continually at high velocity.Have exposure to the sales teams to prioritize what can improve our revenue.Interact with customers and support them in being successful with Rippling.Become the in-house expert on Rippling customers and competition.']

['', 'ABOUT BRIDGEVIEW IT', 'Experience with big data (Spark, Hive, etc.)', 'Understanding of the end-to-end web stack including specifics of the HTTP protocol and proficiency with designing systems at scale.', '5+ years of experience in software development; strong fluency in a server-side programming language required (Java, Python, C#, or PHP preferred).', '\xa0', 'We are unable to sponsor H1B candidates at this time.\xa0Those authorized to work in the US without restriction are encouraged to apply. BridgeView IT is an equal opportunity employer.', 'See your work as it powers improved customer understanding / experience or enables new features and functionality in the tech stack. ', 'EXPERIENCE NEEDED TO BE SUCCESSFUL IN THIS JOB', 'Provide high-quality contributions to the code base, with a mind to best practices and an equally high degree of autonomy.Work with senior leadership to architect solutions and ensure that we deliver the right functionality, in a timely manner.Mentor junior engineers to develop the next generation of engineers. See your work as it powers improved customer understanding / experience or enables new features and functionality in the tech stack. Handle ambiguity with limited oversight; leverage technical acumen, experience, and network to answer questions and remove roadblocks.Propose and own initiatives to completion while balancing various trade-offs including speed to delivery vs. ongoing maintainability and others.Collaborate well with senior management, product managers, and all other stakeholders.', 'Experience with microservice architecture and / or RESTful web service development preferred.', 'Provide high-quality contributions to the code base, with a mind to best practices and an equally high degree of autonomy.', 'Collaborate well with senior management, product managers, and all other stakeholders.', '\ufeffSTUFF OUR LAWYERS WANT US TO SAY', 'Is your idea of the “big picture” more of a massive billboard than a framed 8 x 10 photo? We’re seeking a Senior Software Engineer who is ready to take control of large-scale programs and applications for one of our clients in Boston. ', 'Do you remember when the first YouTube video was uploaded in 2005? We don’t, because we were too busy creating the best technology placement firm in the country. Back then, we saw how extreme the demand was for technologists. Companies needed help finding them, and technologists needed help sifting through the noise. That’s our specialty.', 'Propose and own initiatives to completion while balancing various trade-offs including speed to delivery vs. ongoing maintainability and others.', 'Here’s the thing – large companies have a distinct need for help with their massive technology functions. Whether it’s SAP, a Java application, or SharePoint, these businesses require talent who can keep them up and running smoothly. If you have the breadth of knowledge it takes to work at the enterprise level, our client’s opening is waiting.', 'Mentor junior engineers to develop the next generation of engineers. ', 'Handle ambiguity with limited oversight; leverage technical acumen, experience, and network to answer questions and remove roadblocks.', '5+ years of experience in software development; strong fluency in a server-side programming language required (Java, Python, C#, or PHP preferred).Understanding of the end-to-end web stack including specifics of the HTTP protocol and proficiency with designing systems at scale.Experience with big data (Spark, Hive, etc.)Experience with microservice architecture and / or RESTful web service development preferred.Experience with CI/CD containerization and deployment technology: Docker, Kubernetes, etc.Experience building cross-functional consensus and working with stakeholders such as product managers.', ' EXPERIENCE NEEDED TO BE SUCCESSFUL IN THIS JOB', 'Experience building cross-functional consensus and working with stakeholders such as product managers.', 'You have a valuable set of skills, and it’s our job to make sure you get connected with the roles, companies, and career paths that help you realize your full potential. We don’t just forward you random job descriptions; we build a real relationship to get you wherever it is you want to go. We might be based in Denver, clearly the best city on earth, but we are connected to opportunities across America that will both challenge and fulfill you. Let’s do this. Apply for the above role, or sign up for job alerts at https://bridgeviewit.com/jobalerts.\xa0', 'Work with senior leadership to architect solutions and ensure that we deliver the right functionality, in a timely manner.', 'HOW YOU WILL MAKE AN IMPACT', 'Experience with CI/CD containerization and deployment technology: Docker, Kubernetes, etc.']

job_text: ['Assist with root cause analysis and resolution of production support issues ', 'Responsibilities:', '3 or more years of solid hands on experience in the design, development, testing and integration of high complex software solutions in Java web development and Maven Experience in cloud development with platforms like AWS 2 or more years of applications development environment, database, data management and infrastructure capabilities and constraints 3 or more years experience in an Agile/Scrum team environment Experience using DevSecOps and lean development principles, such as Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (GitHub, Jenkins etc.) 2 or more years working with Test Driven Development (J-Unit, Cucumber, etc.) 2 or more years of varied database experience such as RDS/Postgres / MongoDB Experience working with multiple business stakeholders and providing information technology solutions Strong interpersonal communications, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills ', '\xa0John Deere is currently going through a Smart Industrial Redesign transformation.  To support our journey, it takes a unique skill set.
