', ' Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies. ['', 'Required Skills: ', 'The Data Engineering Group at Trepp is responsible for processing data from numerous vendors, information providers, and data sources and pipelining this data to our newly formed data lake, and further downstream applications.\xa0 The team will be responsible for existing pipelines and systems while simultaneously developing new data services.\xa0 This team, combined with our Product Groups are always thinking of new products and ways to deliver information to our clients to make our tools and applications easier to use, and better integrate with customer workflows. ', 'Responsibilities:', 'Deep experience with Cloud services such as Lake Formation, RDS, Elasticache, EMR ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent (advanced degree preferred) ', ' ', 'Experience in designing and developing the fault-tolerant and scalable distributed systems ', 'We value being able to think up new solutions to problems and be able to develop prototypes and POCs to validate ideas quickly.\xa0 You will be challenged to think creatively for the best solutions to any given project. ', 'Trepp is searching for an individual to join our Technology Group as a Senior Data Infrastructure Engineer.\xa0 We are looking for someone excited by the prospect of optimizing or even re-designing our company’s data architecture to support our next generation of products and data initiatives. We provide a collaborative team environment where our technologists work closely with product and subject matter experts in addition to other technology team members and are empowered to impact the organization through leadership, creativity, and innovation. ', 'A drive to work on financial data systems & pipelines and improve them through the usage of Cloud Architectures ', 'Preferred Skills: ', 'Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations ', 'Preferred Skills:', 'Working knowledge of scheduling tools like Airflow, AWS Batch, Luigi, etc ', '8-10 years of professional programming experience working in engineering departments developing in Java, Python, node.js, or equivalent. ', 'Experience using big data technologies, such as Spark, Kafka, ElasticSearch, Logging & Analysis Systems ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent (advanced degree preferred) 8-10 years of professional programming experience working in engineering departments developing in Java, Python, node.js, or equivalent. Deep experience with Cloud services such as Lake Formation, RDS, Elasticache, EMR Experience building/operating highly available, distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion, and processing of large data sets Experience using big data technologies, such as Spark, Kafka, ElasticSearch, Logging & Analysis Systems Strong knowledge of relational SQL and noSQL databases Experience in designing and developing the fault-tolerant and scalable distributed systems Strong documentation skills (Markdown, you like GitHub READMEs), and the ability to communicate requirements to other team members and project stakeholders. ', 'Strong documentation skills (Markdown, you like GitHub READMEs), and the ability to communicate requirements to other team members and project stakeholders. ', 'Financial Services, Artificial Intelligence and/or Machine Learning ', 'Comfortable being given clear project goals & objectives, and being empowered for discovering optimal solutions. ', 'Required Skills:', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Knowledge of entitlements and Authorization systems to manage data and API access ', 'Experience building/operating highly available, distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion, and processing of large data sets ', 'Determine optimal solutions for integrating data from a variety of sources for projects and migrating data to central Data Lake ', 'A drive to work on financial data systems & pipelines and improve them through the usage of Cloud Architectures Working knowledge of scheduling tools like Airflow, AWS Batch, Luigi, etc Knowledge of entitlements and Authorization systems to manage data and API access Financial Services, Artificial Intelligence and/or Machine Learning ', 'Strong knowledge of relational SQL and noSQL databases ', 'Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations Architect the services and infrastructure to democratize data across our products, APIs, data science team and customers. ['', 'Security Clearance', 'Familiar with building data platforms, microservices, distributed systems', 'Who is Slingshot?', 'Slingshot Aerospace aims to change the way organizations across industries leverage data from earth and space by building technology that delivers situational awareness. We are empowering aerospace, defense, commercial, and emergency management teams to quickly navigate, analyze, and leverage data from different sources - such as satellites, airplanes, drones, and ground-based sensors. By fusing complex data-sets from this multitude of untapped data and applying advanced analytics, machine learning, and collaboration tools, we’re providing our customers with clarity in complex environments for mission-driven decision making.', 'Skill and comfort working in a rapidly moving startup environment with dynamic objectives and iteration with users.', 'understanding of how web technologies work.', 'Have 5+ years of experience shipping products and solutions for data analytics, business process management, or time- series based software.', 'This position will work in Slingshot’s Solutions Business Unit. We are looking for self-starters, innate problem solvers, and passionate about understanding our customer’s greatest underserved needs around situational awareness to craft innovative end-to-end solutions that improve their decision cycles. This person will collaborate across accounts, leading the solution design, development, and implementations. They will also value design-thinking, radical focus, and lean product paradigms to deliver customer value efficiently and effectively. They are masters of reuse; leveraging the Slingshot technologies, open-source offerings, and internal solutions tools to quickly deliver customer success.', 'Advanced data interfaces and interaction ['', 'Join the team handling all things platform and working on a cutting edge proprietary in-memory database platform (built from scratch!).\xa0Bring your talents to bear in continuing to evolve its capability.\xa0', 'Expertise in designing, building and packaging cloud native applications, coupled with cloud environment monitoring and observability experience ', '\xa0', 'Succeeding with 5G will require operators to look beyond the limitations of legacy rating and charging. Success will demand a next-generation Converged Charging System that can enable continuous innovation and continuous deployment to unlock 5G commerce opportunities. Our next-generation rating and charging platform has reinvented what’s possible with OCS and will set the bar for 5G Converged Charging.', 'What makes MATRIXX different?', 'Bring your creative problem-solving mind to add to the collective.\xa0We process a lot of information extremely quickly – scaling for data size and processing speed which presents some interesting challenges.', 'Create vs maintain using cutting edge\xa0technology.', 'A drive to “own it all” and be solely responsible for vital development projects which directly impact our product’s performance.', 'Anyone can be in the systems replacement business, but that’s not what we do.\xa0We are in the reinvention business – re-inventing BSS and the customer\xa0experience for the 5G world that’s coming.\xa0A tall order some would say, but when\xa0companies ask “Isn’t good enough, good enough?”\xa0we answer “Settling for what’s good enough today, won’t help you win for tomorrow.”\xa0\xa0Our cloud native digital commerce platform is leading the way with agility, precision and performance into the next generation of customer experience.', 'Expertise in designing, building and packaging cloud native applications, coupled with cloud environment monitoring and observability experience A curious mindset and passion for coding in C++ that comes from years of experience developing C++ code in a Linux environmentAn ability to check your ego at the door and collaborate to create clean, high-quality code.A desire to join a team that’s solving real world problems for our customers – challenging, difficult, and satisfying to solve.A drive to “own it all” and be solely responsible for vital development projects which directly impact our product’s performance.', 'As a company, we embrace an engineering mindset committed to building right. A product approach that emphasizes growing together with our customers. A sales mindset that embraces integrity in every deal. When you join our company, you’ll have the opportunity to help us empower our rapidly growing, global customer-base with innovative technology built right from scratch. Our people. Empowering customers today, and tomorrow.', 'What does it take to join the team?', 'There are no constraints – we explore all avenues which lead to the best solution.', 'What will you do?', 'A desire to join a team that’s solving real world problems for our customers – challenging, difficult, and satisfying to solve.', 'Join the team handling all things platform and working on a cutting edge proprietary in-memory database platform (built from scratch!).\xa0Bring your talents to bear in continuing to evolve its capability.\xa0Bring your creative problem-solving mind to add to the collective.\xa0We process a lot of information extremely quickly – scaling for data size and processing speed which presents some interesting challenges.Create vs maintain using cutting edge\xa0technology.There are no constraints – we explore all avenues which lead to the best solution.', 'Interested in a conversation? Apply here...', 'What will you do?\xa0', 'An ability to check your ego at the door and collaborate to create clean, high-quality code.', 'A curious mindset and passion for coding in C++ that comes from years of experience developing C++ code in a Linux environment']

job_text: ['', 'Basic to intermediate level Javascript experience is highly desirable.', 'Core Java, Object-Oriented Software Design and problem solving skills3-5 years of experience with building data warehouse, data lake, and must have worked building complex and high-performance ETL systems using Java.Solid understanding of SQL and relational databases. Experience with MySQL or PostgreSQL is highly desired, but experience with any other relational database is sufficient.Familiarity with Continuous Delivery, Continuous Integration, Unit Testing, etc.Basic to intermediate level Javascript experience is highly desirable.Agile development practices.Cloud Services (e.g. AWS) knowledge is a huge plus.Experience with data modeling, Analytics/Business Intelligence tools such as Looker, Microsoft BI, Tableau, SAP Business Objects is a strong plus.Basic knowledge of data science, statistics, and search technologies such as Elasticsearch, Lucene/Solr is a plus. A typical candidate has some experience with Computer Science or equivalent.', 'A desire to work collaboratively in an empowered, small, cross-functional team.Experience working in an agile development environment. job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Biomedical Imaging and Informatics
job_text: ['', 'Participate in code reviews, issue tracking, unit testing and documentation.', ' Minimum of 5+ years of experience working in a bioinformatics or biomedical imaging industry role. Advanced degree or equivalent experience. Demonstrated success delivering timely results to scientific and/or medical industry customers that exceed expectations. Strong working knowledge of software development for data-intensive applications; ability to analyze and interpret technical data from a wide variety of sources. Proficiency with the majority of Python, C/C++, MySQL, Google Cloud Platform, Linux.  Exposure to working in an environment subject to regulatory compliance requirements. Excellent oral and written communication skills. Previous experience with digital pathology, immuno-oncology, and/or neuroscience is preferred. Familiarity with web development using Angular or React is a plus.', 'Demonstrated success delivering timely results to scientific and/or medical industry customers that exceed expectations.', " Scale IONpath's biomedical imaging and informatics platform to meet growing demands from pharma and academia. Closely collaborate with laboratory and data science teams on design, troubleshooting, and execution. Develop software that applies signal processing, image analysis and machine learning methods to mass spectrometry and single-cell data.  Contribute to system architecture; design and implement monitoring and deployment strategies to ensure reliability and scalability. Demonstrate technical leadership and mentorship to other members of the informatics team. Participate in code reviews, issue tracking, unit testing and documentation. Work with quality assurance to maintain compliance with data security and privacy regulations. ", 'Strong working knowledge of software development for data-intensive applications; ability to analyze and interpret technical data from a wide variety of sources.', 'Contribute to system architecture; design and implement monitoring and deployment strategies to ensure reliability and scalability.', 'Work with quality assurance to maintain compliance with data security and privacy regulations.', 'Closely collaborate with laboratory and data science teams on design, troubleshooting, and execution.', 'Develop software that applies signal processing, image analysis and machine learning methods to mass spectrometry and single-cell data. Should be commutable to the office.', '-\xa0Tun/Tap implementations (Android, Linux, Windows)', '- Strong software and systems skills and experience in prototype development:', '-\xa0Linux programming (netlink, netfilter, sockets, iptables, iprule, iproutes)', 'Must be able to pass a Federal Background Check and be eligible for a Security Clearance that would be provided.', '- Knowledge of networking technologies such as SD-WAN Cisco/Juniper architectures and implementations, WAN Multi-Topology Routing, Cisco/Juniper configuration via CLI and SNMP, Commercial Solutions for Classified (CSfC).\xa0', '-\xa0Windows programming (pipes, WinDivert library)', 'This is a year long contract that will likely be extended.', '.', 'Desired:', '- B.S./M.S. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.', 'Will be working in diverse areas related to wireless systems architectures and protocols.', 'This is an enviroment that is developing networking software for more efficient and reliable network communications in disconnected, intermittent wireless environments.', '- 5+ years of experience in designing, implementing, and integrating complex software systems.', '\xa0\xa0', '- Experience with Tactical Radios like SINCGARS, ASIP, TSM, HF; Bridging devices like Ultralink and Taclink; BFT2 control and data stack, and BFT2 transceivers and simulators; NCW, FDMA radios/modems; Tactical systems like AFATDS, MFoCS/JBC-P; ATAK/MTAK architectures; MILSTD-2045-47001C.']

we use Big Table/HBase, Spark, Dataflow, Spanner, BigQuery , and Elasticsearch ', ' Work closely with SRE and Cyber Security teams to prevent and mitigate attacks; plan and implement large scale events ', ' Evaluate storage technologies and methodologies with an eye toward scalability and performance ', ' Help to design, implement, and maintain platform level solutions used by other engineering teams and the larger Honey organization ', ' You plan for, built , evolve and scrutinize monitoring and alerting for your production systems ', 'Travel Percent', ' You are willing and able to deploy, troubleshoot, and maintain your systems in production and staging environments  You’ve architected with both SQL and NoSQL data stores; we use Big Table/HBase, Spark, Dataflow, Spanner, BigQuery , and Elasticsearch ', ' NOTE: If your name is hyphenated or has multiple capitalization, please use the same format as your government ID. ', ' Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies. ['', '• As the online marketplace becomes the new dealership this position will be responsible for helping redesign how customer experience our products across all our properties', '• Experience in some of the following preferred: Microsoft.NET (C#), .NET Core', '• Working knowledge of cloud platforms such as Azure or AWS preferred', '• Hands-on development to create and support new products and services that provide teams the ability to progress a customer through an online transaction', '• Market your new ideas internally and evolve them according to feedback and critique within an agile environment', "At CarMax, we want to disrupt our industry by empowering customers to buy a car on their own terms - allowing them to transact with us anytime, anywhere. As a Senior developer, you'll be at the forefront of driving technical innovation alongside several product teams who are creating a seamless online transaction experience for our customers and associates.", 'What you will do - Essential responsibilities', "You are: Able to balance customer needs with business goals and know how to deliver technical solutions that enhance business value. Creative, curious and highly analytical, you never stop learning and thrive on constant change in the digital marketplace. From inception to completion, you will develop tools and technology, learning quickly from our spirit of experimentation. Overall, you will have a direct impact on improving the performance of our business and ensuring customers can buy the vehicles they want in a way that's right for them.", "Upon an applicant's request, CarMax will consider reasonable accommodation to complete the CarMax Job Application", '• Deliver the next generation of immersive experience for customers', 'Your expertise shapes our digital business', "Together we'll be: A passionate technology team, developing ground-breaking products. Working collaboratively and creatively as part of a close-knit product team, you will be part of the development process from end to end: consulting users, carrying out experiments, tackling complex business problems and implementing new products.", '• A degree in Computer Science or a related discipline or equivalent experience', 'We are: A team of experts (such as a Product Manager, Lead Developer, UX Designer, Delivery Manager, Quality Engineer, Analyst/Data Scientist, and other Software Developers), working in a fast-paced, highly collaborative, and customer-focused environment to bring a seamless online shopping experience to life.', "What technologies you'll be working with", 'Qualifications and requirements', '• Cross microsite development leveraging JavaScript or other technologies', '• Collaborate with colleagues in product design, product management and systems architecture to develop experimental solutions and bring great ideas to life', '• At least five years of application development experience', '• Understanding of DevOps capabilities such as automated testing, continuous integration, and continuous delivery preferred', 'This role requires hands-on work in technologies such as JavaScript, ReactJS, Azure PaaS (Functions, App Services, App Insights, Redis, and others), .NET Core, TeamCity or Azure DevOps for CI/CD, Akamai edge, Javascript, React, load testing / automated testing tools like Selenium / Browserstack, Splunk, and API management systems. But more importantly at CarMax we are always learning so our tool set will evolve as you do.', '• Stay on top of industry trends and best practice to continuously improve what we do and ensure our customer experience is the best it can be', 'CarMax, the way your career should be!']

['If interested please get in touch here or at Volkan.ozbicer@radleyjames.com with your resume.', 'A leading algorithmic trading team in a tier 1 investment bank is looking to build out their next state of the art trading platform.', 'Interest in capital markets/trading will be necessary', 'andidate does not need finance experience', 'Core backend Java experience for the past 3 years in a professional setting', 'We are supporting this team in multiple locations hire junior to senior level engineers to work on various projects with the algo trading system including, but not limited to: SOR, infrastructure, low latency, market data, algo stack implementation etc.', 'Requirements:', 'Work on large scale enterprise software is a big plus', 'Experience on designing and architecting projects on large systems', '\xa0', '3 years in a professional setting', 'A computer science or related degree minimum at BSc level with a strong GPA\xa0\xa0\xa0Core backend Java experience for the past 3 years in a professional settingWork on large scale enterprise software is a big plusInterest in capital markets/trading will be necessaryExperience on designing and architecting projects on large systemsandidate does not need finance experience', 'A computer science or related degree minimum at BSc level with a strong GPA\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'The current focus in the New York City office is to hire a junior-mid level engineer with a minimum of 3 years core backend java development to work alongside senior engineers on various core platform projects.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Access Control & Security
job_text: ['', "Be innovative - you'll think outside of the box when coming up with technical solutions that deliver business value", 'Be a solid team player- you can expect to work with others in a highly, collaborative environment', 'Database schema design, performance optimization skills and query tuning', '3+ years of experience with a relational SQL database.', 'Strong analytical and creative problem solving skills', "Be the owner of the product – you will work closely with the business to build a strong productBe a solid team player- you can expect to work with others in a highly, collaborative environmentBe innovative - you'll think outside of the box when coming up with technical solutions that deliver business valueBe passionate- you're passionate about our diverse set of users and productsBe proactive- you'll contribute ideas on everything from UI, product, tech stack and our development flow", 'Professional experience with Python', "Be proactive- you'll contribute ideas on everything from UI, product, tech stack and our development flow", 'Experience with web services, XSD/WSDL, SOAP, SOA and micro-services architecture', 'Be the owner of the product – you will work closely with the business to build a strong product', '4+ years of software engineering experience in a strongly-typed object-oriented language (C#, Java, C++)3+ years of experience with a relational SQL database.Strong analytical and creative problem solving skillsBA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering, or related technology field', 'Familiar with unit testing, CI/CD and Dev-Ops.', "In this role, you will work closely with our business partners to identify critical problems and develop robust solutions with high resilience requirements. The business areas include but are not limited to our privileging management and checking system, employee badge system, visitor management system, crisis/incident management, and emergency mass notification system. If you love owning critical systems and are passionate about using the technology that's right for the job, please apply below! ", 'The Access Control and Security Engineering team is responsible for ensuring proper security measures and risk management throughout the company. We manage a suite of applications, ranging from data classification, data security/protection, incident management, to general physical security such as access control in company facilities. Our team is seeking a self-motivated senior software engineer with an interest in designing solutions for complex development environments and implementing scalable architectures to improve overall security throughout all levels of management in the organization. ', "Be passionate- you're passionate about our diverse set of users and products", 'BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering, or related technology field', '4+ years of software engineering experience in a strongly-typed object-oriented language (C#, Java, C++)', 'Professional experience with PythonFamiliar with unit testing, CI/CD and Dev-Ops.Database schema design, performance optimization skills and query tuningExperience with web services, XSD/WSDL, SOAP, SOA and micro-services architecture', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.']

['WE EXIST TO IMPROVE THE PERFORMANCE OF ATHLETES AND TEAMS', 'WE WANT PEOPLE WHO ARE PASSIONATE ABOUT DEVOPS ', 'We care about you. We offer outstanding paid maternity and paternity leave, a 401k plan with up to a 4% employer match. ', 'We encourage our people to have constructive, open and honest communication; to make Catapult extraordinary; innovate and create smart solutions; establish a collaborative, yet challenging, environment to develop our performance and the performance of our customers. ', "WHAT YOU'LL DO", '\xa0In this role, you’ll work collaboratively with software engineers to deploy and operate our systems, help automate and streamline our operations and processes, build and maintain tools for deployment, monitoring and operations as well as troubleshoot and resolve issues in our development, staging, and production environments ', 'We have amazing people. We can promise you will work with some of the most ambitious and intelligent people in an exciting industry, and you will do some of the best work of your life. ', ' ', 'Strong knowledge of Linux/Unix systems and sysadmin experience ', "WHAT YOU'LL NEED ", "Our mission is to improve the performance of athletes and teams, which we do by engineering the premier technology platform for sport. We've been at the forefront of sports technology and science since 2006 - we don't just work in the sporting industry, we are actively changing its future.  Our solutions are designed to help athletes and coaches “play smart” in a world where 1% can literally mean the difference between winning and losing. ", "WHAT YOU'LL DO ", 'Highly developed, process-oriented skills for troubleshooting and problem solving ', 'WE EXIST TO IMPROVE THE PERFORMANCE OF ATHLETES AND TEAMS ', 'Create infrastructure service health dashboards ', 'Knowledge of SQL/NoSQL databases is a strong plus (MongoDB is preferred) ', 'In order to build the future of sports performance, we need the brightest talent in order to do so. If you think you can contribute to the empowering, enjoyable and exciting Catapult environment, then we invite you to apply.', 'Whether you’re interested in sports or not, you’ll have the satisfaction of knowing your work is supporting some of the most successful teams and individual athletes on the planet! While we have access to many exciting opportunities, we also realise that we are here to do a very important job for our customers. As a result, we aim to work with purpose and intention. We look for people that fit into our team culture, those who actively contribute and individuals who are excited about what they do. ', 'Enhance monitoring and alerting that spans across development and operations. ', 'Experience with cloud-based infrastructure, particularly Amazon Web Services (EC2, Lambda, Route 53, CloudFront, etc.) ', 'Develop automation scripts, daemons, and APIs to reduce operational overhead ', "Our workforce spans more than 20 countries, you'll have the opportunity to work across multiple nationalities and cultures, and build your global awareness and capability even beyond what it is today. ", 'Experience with deployment and configuration systems, such as Ansible or Chef/Puppet ', 'Excel in an agile and collaborative software development environment ', 'We are building the next generation cloud platform that combines digital video assets, wearable data and athlete information to provide insights and analytics to coaching/support staff, sports scientists and athletes to assist in optimizing athlete performance. We believe that our customers deserve the best platform and we are on a mission to address these needs. You could be the one to help us achieve this goal! ', 'We value improvement and development. We are challenging ourselves to continuously grow and become a high-performance company. That means we maintain a growth mindset in everything we do, and our people are always looking for ways to do things better.  There is unlimited opportunity to grow, do more, and do better. ', '5+ years coding experience in scripting languages (Python, Bash, PHP, etc.) Passion for writing code to solve multiple problems through automation and tools Experience with cloud-based infrastructure, particularly Amazon Web Services (EC2, Lambda, Route 53, CloudFront, etc.) Experience with deployment and configuration systems, such as Ansible or Chef/Puppet Strong knowledge of Linux/Unix systems and sysadmin experience Knowledge of SQL/NoSQL databases is a strong plus (MongoDB is preferred) Highly developed, process-oriented skills for troubleshooting and problem solving Excel in an agile and collaborative software development environment ', 'Passion for writing code to solve multiple problems through automation and tools ', 'WE WANT PEOPLE WHO ARE PASSIONATE ABOUT DEVOPS', 'Develop continuous integration tools and processes that streamline testing & deployment of large-scale systems on public and private clouds ', 'Work with our development and operations teams to support application builds, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines Automate and support a scalable cloud infrastructure using services such as AWS, Docker, and Terraform Enhance monitoring and alerting that spans across development and operations. Guide our development and operations team in infrastructure best practices Create infrastructure service health dashboards Develop continuous integration tools and processes that streamline testing & deployment of large-scale systems on public and private clouds Develop automation scripts, daemons, and APIs to reduce operational overhead ', 'Work with our development and operations teams to support application builds, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines ', 'Automate and support a scalable cloud infrastructure using services such as AWS, Docker, and Terraform ', 'We work with over 3,000 teams around the world, empowering coaches, managers and trainers in premier teams in the NFL, NBA, NHL, MLS, EPL, AFL, NRL, NCAA and more. We provide the information they need to optimize athletes’ health, game-day readiness, and performance, as well as in-game tactics.  Our solutions include wearable technology, video analytics, and athlete monitoring solutions, and we are passionate about helping sports organizations at all levels to better scout, recruit, teach, and win. ', 'Guide our development and operations team in infrastructure best practices ', '5+ years coding experience in scripting languages (Python, Bash, PHP, etc.) ', 'We are looking for a Senior DevOps engineer with strong SaaS and cloud services experience. You will be responsible for building and operating all aspects of our cloud-based architecture with a focus on automation and tool development to achieve our vision of infrastructure as code. This is a high impact role in a fast-paced organization that runs on the most cutting edge cloud-based infrastructure. ', 'WHY CATAPULT? ', "We have amazing people. We can promise you will work with some of the most ambitious and intelligent people in an exciting industry, and you will do some of the best work of your life. We encourage our people to have constructive, open and honest communication; to make Catapult extraordinary; innovate and create smart solutions; establish a collaborative, yet challenging, environment to develop our performance and the performance of our customers. Our workforce spans more than 20 countries, you'll have the opportunity to work across multiple nationalities and cultures, and build your global awareness and capability even beyond what it is today. We value improvement and development. We are challenging ourselves to continuously grow and become a high-performance company. That means we maintain a growth mindset in everything we do, and our people are always looking for ways to do things better.  There is unlimited opportunity to grow, do more, and do better. We care about you. We offer outstanding paid maternity and paternity leave, a 401k plan with up to a 4% employer match. "]

job_title: Full Stack Software Engineer - Enterprise Applications
job_text: ['Work in a dynamic Agile/Scrum based environment. \xa0', 'Demonstrate progress of projects through weekly meetings.', 'Design systems that are highly available & widely scalable', 'Support customer sites and SQA during the rollout of new software services', 'Work with test engineers in defining use cases for new software services', 'Symbotic currently has an opening for a Full Stack Software Engineer who will play a hands-on role in the development of a suite of applications, both mobile, web and desktop for our next generation of software which controls fleets of mobile robots and industrial systems.\xa0 Symbotic is looking for people who thrive in a fast paced, creative, collaborative and agile\xa0development environment.', 'Coordinate with other groups to implement a feature that has dependencies on other teams.', 'Design, implement, and enhance applications that span desktop, mobile and web technology stacks utilizing the following technologies:\xa0 C#, TypeScript, Angular, RabbitMQ, Redis, WPF and ASP.NET MVC.\xa0Design systems that are highly available & widely scalableParticipate in defining solutions to solve customer problemsDemonstrate progress of projects through weekly meetings.Participate in the functional requirements review, design and architecture meetings.Coordinate with other groups to implement a feature that has dependencies on other teams.Support customer sites and SQA during the rollout of new software servicesWork with test engineers in defining use cases for new software servicesWork in a dynamic Agile/Scrum based environment. \xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Design, implement, and enhance applications that span desktop, mobile and web technology stacks utilizing the following technologies:\xa0 C#, TypeScript, Angular, RabbitMQ, Redis, WPF and ASP.NET MVC.\xa0', 'Participate in defining solutions to solve customer problems', 'Participate in the functional requirements review, design and architecture meetings.']

['', 'We are looking for an experienced backend software engineer who is passionate about shipping customer-facing products to join our small, dynamic, fast-moving team. You will be working on our mapping team, rapidly delivering products that allow our customers to process drone data into 2D and 3D maps, and building advanced customer-facing features on top of this data to allow them to extract valuable information for their businesses.', 'Ranked #1 as the Best Place to Work in the Bay, our team is creative, driven, and committed to providing our customers with the best drone software platform in the industry. We believe in a work environment that empowers everyone to explore, grow, and make an impact.', 'Weekly virtual yoga classes', '$1,000 annual professional development reimbursement', '5+ years of software development experience', 'Take ownership of new projects and features from design to customer rolloutProduce high quality, reliable, well-tested software to help power our drone data platformInspire innovation and cultivate an environment of continuous improvement', 'Experience developing production Python applications', 'Experience developing production web/enterprise SaaS platforms', 'Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, MongoDB', 'Parental leave', 'Take ownership of new projects and features from design to customer rollout', 'DroneDeploy is an equal opportunity employer.', 'DroneDeploy is the enterprise-grade drone data platform for managing complex job sites. Trusted by brands globally, our software automates everything from flight to insight, making the power of aerial data accessible and productive for everyone. We’re transforming data collection across a variety of industries, including agriculture, oil & gas, construction, solar, and utilities, so teams can survey large areas and make informed decisions quickly, safely, and accurately. We are the leading drone software company with over 5,000 customers across 200 countries. Our team is comprised of passionate, tech-driven enthusiasts. Voted the #1 Best Place to Work in the Bay Area, we welcome talented professionals looking to make an impact.', '$75 monthly wellness reimbursement', 'Weekly virtual boot camp workout classes', 'Produce high quality, reliable, well-tested software to help power our drone data platform', '5+ years of software development experienceExperience developing production Python applicationsExperience developing production web/enterprise SaaS platforms', 'Perks & Benefits', 'All DroneDeploy employees are responsible for assisting in protecting the company and customer data by following information security policies and procedures.', 'Responsibilities', 'Flexible vacation policy', 'Requirements', 'Bonus', 'Life at DroneDeploy', 'Inspire innovation and cultivate an environment of continuous improvement', 'Experience with GIS, computer vision, or machine learning', 'Experience developing user-facing FE code within modern frameworks (React / Angular)', 'Experience developing user-facing FE code within modern frameworks (React / Angular)Experience with GIS, computer vision, or machine learningExperience with Python asynchronous developmentExperience with Docker, Kubernetes, MongoDB', 'Experience with Python asynchronous development', 'Commuter benefits', 'Remote-first culture', 'Referral bonuses', 'Medical, Dental, Vision']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Hardware Automation Engineering
job_text: ['', 'Work on a hardware acceptance test suite and automation to be run on all new and rebuild hardware in the field', 'huge', 'A general understanding of servers and networking', 'Privacy Policy', 'teams.', 'about', 'Fastly collects and processes personal data submitted by job applicants in accordance with our', ' We have a huge impact. Fastly is a small company with a big reach. Not only do our customers have a tremendous user base, but we also support a growing number of open source projects and initiatives. Outside of code, employees are encouraged to share causes close to their heart with others so we can help lend a supportive hand. We love distributed teams. Fastly’s home-base is in San Francisco, but we have multiple offices and employees sprinkled around the globe. In fact, 50% of our employees work outside of SF! An international remote culture is in our DNA. We care about you. Fastly works hard to create a positive environment for our employees, and we think your life outside of work is important too. We support our teams with great benefits like up to 20 weeks of paid parental leave, options for free medical/dental/vision plans, and an open vacation program that enables our folks to take the time they need to recharge (some benefits may vary by location). We value diversity. Growing and maintaining our inclusive and diverse team matters to us. We are committed to being a company where our employees feel comfortable bringing their authentic selves to work and have the ability to be successful -- every day. We are passionate. About Integral Ad ScienceIntegral Ad Science (IAS) is the global market leader in digital ad verification, offering technologies that drive high-quality advertising media. IAS equips advertisers and publishers with both the insight and technology to protect their advertising investments from fraud and unsafe environments as well as to capture consumer attention, and drive business outcomes. Founded in 2009, IAS is headquartered in New York with global operations in 18 offices across 13 countries. IAS is part of the Vista Equity Partners portfolio of software companies. For more on how IAS is powering great impressions for top publishers and advertisers around the world, visit integralads.com.Equal Opportunity EmployerIAS is an equal opportunity employer, committed to our diversity and inclusiveness. ['Greylock Talent: ', 'Greylock Talent:', "I am a full-time, salaried employee of Greylock, and there are no fees associated with any of the work I do. My team provides free candidate referrals/introductions to all of our active investments (one of the many services we provide), and I'm always looking to add new people to our network of talent.", "One of their current projects is to\xa0build cross-cutting features in the dataplane by using and extending state of the art service mesh technologies. If this type of work sounds interesting, I'd love to hear from you =) ", 'Application Process:', 'Due to the volume of applicants we typically receive from our job postings, a follow-up email will not be sent until a match is identified with one of our investments. ', 'Application Process: ', "I will contact anyone who looks like a potential match for this opportunity--requesting to schedule a call with you immediately. Once contacted, I'll explain our VC Recruiting model, spend some time getting to know you better, and will discuss various startup opportunities within our portfolio with you as well. ", ' ', 'One of our investments is looking to reimagine the architecture and design of a prominent, large-scale healthcare technology platform (which currently drives over $150M ARR). Led by seasoned experts from Amazon AWS, Cloudera, etc.--this team owns the foundational infrastructure that every data scientist, machine learning, and software engineer in the company relies upon. Sitting\xa0at the bottom of the stack (right above AWS), they often like to bend Kubernetes and Istio to their will to make "magic happen".\xa0 ']

['', 'As needed, Support Partners with architecture and deployment of Udemy For Business using Web Service APIs. ', 'Create/Manage open source projects in partnerships with your Solutions Engineer colleagues.', 'An understanding of core security concepts; e.g., SSL/TLS, encryption ciphers, and GDPR data privacy.', 'Serve as technical subject matter expert for customers, and internal teams on all aspects of integration between Udemy for Business and SaaS applications; e.g., via Web Single Sign-On, API and HRIS/LMS integrations, analytics, and reporting data streams.Create code samples, demos, articles and tutorials for a highly technical audienceExperience of blogging, technical documentation, and developer outreach.Create/Manage open source projects in partnerships with your Solutions Engineer colleagues.Become a key contributor to Udemy’s community engagement for our UFB customers.Implement and document solutions for integrating Udemy for Business with SaaS applications. As needed, Support Partners with architecture and deployment of Udemy For Business using Web Service APIs. Collaborate with the Solutions Engineering and Product teams to improve our integration services.', 'Serve as technical subject matter expert for customers, and internal teams on all aspects of integration between Udemy for Business and SaaS applications; e.g., via Web Single Sign-On, API and HRIS/LMS integrations, analytics, and reporting data streams.', 'Become a key contributor to Udemy’s community engagement for our UFB customers.', 'Implement and document solutions for integrating Udemy for Business with SaaS applications. ', 'Udemy in the News', 'About The Role', 'About Udemy', 'Collaborate with the Solutions Engineering and Product teams to improve our integration services.', "We're Excited About You Because You Have", 'Experience of blogging, technical documentation, and developer outreach.', 'Create code samples, demos, articles and tutorials for a highly technical audience', 'Some experience with: Python (Django framework), java, modern JS frameworks (Angular, React), experience working with microservices., understanding of data structures and algorithms, working knowledge of Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) architecture (e.g., AWS)., experience with popular structured query languages (mysql, postgres, pl/sql).', '5-7 years of engineering or solution consulting experience in a SaaS organization.', "5-7 years of engineering or solution consulting experience in a SaaS organization.Some experience with: Python (Django framework), java, modern JS frameworks (Angular, React), experience working with microservices., understanding of data structures and algorithms, working knowledge of Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) architecture (e.g., AWS)., experience with popular structured query languages (mysql, postgres, pl/sql).Solid understanding of authentication protocols (e.g., SAML 2.0, SCIM, OAuth/OpenID Connect), Web APIs, SMTP (e.g, SendGrid), DNS (e.g., CloudFlare) and experience debugging Web applications (e.g., Chrome DevTools).Excellent written and verbal communication skills and a track record of successfully overcoming technical and security objections in customer integrations; problem-solving is in your DNA.An understanding of core security concepts; e.g., SSL/TLS, encryption ciphers, and GDPR data privacy.Self-driven, highly motivated, and able to learn quickly in a fast-growing and dynamic environment.Hands-on experience architecting or deploying Single Sign-On (SSO) with SAML 2.0, OIDC, SCIM, Active Directory, LDAP, OAuth 2, across disparate identity solutions such as Okta, Azure/AD FS, PingOne/PingFederate, OneLogin.Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, or an equivalent degree and experience.", "Here's What You'll Be Doing", 'Hands-on experience architecting or deploying Single Sign-On (SSO) with SAML 2.0, OIDC, SCIM, Active Directory, LDAP, OAuth 2, across disparate identity solutions such as Okta, Azure/AD FS, PingOne/PingFederate, OneLogin.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, or an equivalent degree and experience.", 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills and a track record of successfully overcoming technical and security objections in customer integrations; problem-solving is in your DNA.', 'Self-driven, highly motivated, and able to learn quickly in a fast-growing and dynamic environment.', 'Solid understanding of authentication protocols (e.g., SAML 2.0, SCIM, OAuth/OpenID Connect), Web APIs, SMTP (e.g, SendGrid), DNS (e.g., CloudFlare) and experience debugging Web applications (e.g., Chrome DevTools).']

job_title: Sr. Software Engineer in Test - (Able to work remotely anywhere in United States
job_text: ['', '\xa0Education and Experience:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong analytical, diagnosis, and troubleshooting skills.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with engineering development departments within Spectra Logic to facilitate the transfer of knowledge to the Test group for new projects and products.', 'Summary of Position:', 'Why Spectra?', '\xa0Status: Full Time', 'Located in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains in Boulder, Colorado, Spectra Logic provides a career and\xa0work experience second to none.\xa0Develop high quality solutions while gazing at the fabulous view; work out on your own or with our trainer at one of the on-campus gyms; grab lunch or snacks onsite or challenge the CEO to a game of pinball; and grow your career with peers who are second to none.\xa0Privately held since its inception in 1979,\xa0Spectra is allowed to do what is right without having to\xa0satisfy the analysts each quarter. That means our associates and customers come out as winners.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with basic System Administrator for Windows, Unix, and Linux environments.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of B.S. degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or 5+ years of related experience.', 'Specific Responsibilities:', 'Isn’t\xa0it\xa0time you joined our winning team?', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A thorough understanding of the Spectra Logic Deep Storage Devices product line.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Perform root cause analysis on issues found in order to develop an automated regression tests', '*** Spectra Logic is committed to the practice and policies of equal employment opportunities in the recruitment, employment and promotion of all associates without regard to age 40 and over, color, disability, gender, gender identity, genetic information, military or veteran status, national origin, race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, or any other applicable status protected by state or local law.', 'Benefits: Spectra Logic provides a casual work environment, competitive salaries, and a compensation structure that rewards contribution and hard work. Our full benefits package includes 401(k), medical, life, AD&D, flex spending accounts, and company paid short and long term disability.', 'Equal\xa0Employment Opportunities (EEO) Statement: Spectra Logic is committed to the practice and policies of equal employment opportunities in the recruitment, employment and promotion of all associates without regard to race, religion, sex, age, gender, minority, veterans, national origin or ancestry.\xa0', 'Education and Experience:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with HW and SW integrated solutions a plus.', 'Status: Full Time', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design test plans and test cases using a variety of technologies that are precise, accurate, repeatable, maintainable, and clean.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of Test Engineering experience preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be passionate about creating world class products by applying new testing methodologies.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must be able to work in an Agile environment where requirements and priorities can change very quickly.', 'Why choose to work at Spectra Logic? Enjoy both company-wide and Engineering-centric outings (baseball games, retreats, BBQ’s, etc...). On campus gym and fitness classes with a personal trainer, full cafeteria, and last but not least - work and life balance so you remain positive, productive and most of all, happy! Our casual work environment allows you to enjoy stocked snacks in our kitchens, Foosball, pinball, horseshoes, and volleyball. We are having fun here, come join us!', 'Sr. Software Engineer in Test - (Able to work remotely anywhere in US) - ( 3 opportunities) ', 'You will work in the Test Engineering Group, focused on automated validation of Emerging Markets storage solutions. Day to day activities will include test planning and test case design, implementing automated test infrastructure and automated tests, tracking, and reporting.\xa0Programming experience a must, (i.e., Java or C++ or any mainstream OOP language). Go programming a plus.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Effectively communicate with other development groups in order to provide all necessary information needed to fix the bugs found.']

That means our associates and customers come out as winners.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with basic System Administrator for Windows, Unix, and Linux environments.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of B.S. degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or 5+ years of related experience.', 'Specific Responsibilities:', 'Isn’t\xa0it\xa0time you joined our winning team?', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A thorough understanding of the Spectra Logic Deep Storage Devices product line.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Perform root cause analysis on issues found in order to develop an automated regression tests', '*** Spectra Logic is committed to the practice and policies of equal employment opportunities in the recruitment, employment and promotion of all associates without regard to age 40 and over, color, disability, gender, gender identity, genetic information, military or veteran status, national origin, race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, or any other applicable status protected by state or local law.', 'Benefits: Spectra Logic provides a casual work environment, competitive salaries, and a compensation structure that rewards contribution and hard work. Our full benefits package includes 401(k), medical, life, AD&D, flex spending accounts, and company paid short and long term disability.', 'Equal\xa0Employment Opportunities (EEO) Statement: Spectra Logic is committed to the practice and policies of equal employment opportunities in the recruitment, employment and promotion of all associates without regard to race, religion, sex, age, gender, minority, veterans, national origin or ancestry.\xa0', 'Education and Experience:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with HW and SW integrated solutions a plus.', 'Status: Full Time', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design test plans and test cases using a variety of technologies that are precise, accurate, repeatable, maintainable, and clean.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of Test Engineering experience preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be passionate about creating world class products by applying new testing methodologies.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must be able to work in an Agile environment where requirements and priorities can change very quickly.', 'Why choose to work at Spectra Logic? Enjoy both company-wide and Engineering-centric outings (baseball games, retreats, BBQ’s, etc...). On campus gym and fitness classes with a personal trainer, full cafeteria, and last but not least - work and life balance so you remain positive, productive and most of all, happy! Our casual work environment allows you to enjoy stocked snacks in our kitchens, Foosball, pinball, horseshoes, and volleyball. We are having fun here, come join us!', 'Sr. Software Engineer in Test - (Able to work remotely anywhere in US) - ( 3 opportunities) ', 'You will work in the Test Engineering Group, focused on automated validation of Emerging Markets storage solutions. Day to day activities will include test planning and test case design, implementing automated test infrastructure and automated tests, tracking, and reporting.\xa0Programming experience a must, (i.e., Java or C++ or any mainstream OOP language). Go programming a plus.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Effectively communicate with other development groups in order to provide all necessary information needed to fix the bugs found.']

["Education and Experience  The successful incumbent will have a Bachelor's or Master's of Science degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Information Technology from a regionally accredited university. Also, prefer 2-5 years of prior relevant experience. ", '60 K Annual Salary. ', '60 K Annual Salary.  ', 'Please do not Apply of you can not commute to Redlands every day. ', ' \xa0  Required Skills  •  • Knows fundamental concepts, practices, and procedures of software engineering•  • Experience with Visual Studio, GIT repository, and embedded systems, RTOS•  • Experience with high level programming languages: Visual Basic, C++, C#, SQL, ActiveX Controls, and .NET Framework•  • Experience with Modbus family of protocols•  • Strong interpersonal communication skills•  • SCADA project or application development•  • Ability to demonstrate software in-person or via web conference•  • Strong technical writing skills•  • Some travel (domestic and international) may be required•  • Bilingual (Spanish, German, or French) a plus ']

Computer Science\xa0', 'Kipp@west500partners.com', 'Demonstrated proficiency in Asp.Net, SQL, and C#', 'In addition to a robust benefits package, they offer their employees flexible work hours, countless opportunities to grow your skillset, great coworkers, and so much more.\xa0', "Attributes they're seeking:", "They are adding 3 Full-Stack Software Engineers to help them execute on an ambitious roadmap. It's a fun, supportive team and they're looking for engineers who want a high impact role.", 'At this time, there is no relocation available and we are unable to sponsor visas.\xa0', 'Solid web development skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript', "Our client creates modern, user-friendly, talent engagement software that helps companies and job applicants connect with one another. ['', 'The Core Technology group is responsible for identifying common needs across the company and building solutions for those opportunities. The Security team is responsible for protecting our titles on multiple platforms to ensure a secure, reliable experience for our gamers. We fill our team with individuals who enjoy a challenge, enjoy working in a fast-paced environment, and want to take ownership and responsibility for products. If you are passionate about working in the game industry and implementing cool features for our game products, come join our team.', '• B.S. in Computer Science, or equivalent', '2K publishes some of the most popular video game franchises on the planet including Mafia, Borderlands, BioShock, NBA 2K, WWE 2K, XCOM, and Sid Meier’s Civilization.', 'What We Need:', '• Ability to explain security issues to both technical and non-technical audiences', '• Capable with Perforce and GitHub', '• Implement security features in game code and back end services', '• Comfortable working with: PC, Linux, consoles, Android, iOS, MacOS', 'Who We Think Will Be A Great Fit:', '• Solid in any of: C#, JavaScript, etc.', '• Reverse engineer malware intended to compromise our games', '• Create documented, testable, scalable, security applications and tools', '• Mentor engineers and champion security best-practices at studios', '• An attitude of achievement when our partners are successful', '• Security concepts: input validation, authentication, authorization, cryptography, data at-rest and transport protection, session management, code obfuscation, etc.', '• Game console development knowledge', '• Work with security management and analysts to gather requirements', '• A passion for working in games', '• Skilled with unit and automated testing', '• Experience with multiple SQL and noSQL databases at scale', '• Proficiency in game and server languages: C++ and Java/Golang', 'Who We Are:']

['', 'You have a sustained track record of making significant, self-directed, and end-to-end contributions to large and impactful software projects. You think beyond just the task at hand to deeply understand the \'why\' behind what you are doing. You understand engineering fundamentals. At our scale, many off-the-shelf techniques and existing technologies (open source and enterprise) simply don\'t work. You are able to work from first principles to evaluate solutions and adapt them to a unique environment. You are a broadly skilled engineer, accustomed to developing web services. You have experience building always-on systems, working across a variety of technologies and service layers.You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making.You work with confidence and without ego. Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates. You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done". What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need engineers who know all the answers; we need engineers who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked. ', 'Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. We are a welcoming place for everyone, and we do our best to make sure all people feel supported and connected at work. A big part of that effort is our support for members and allies of internal groups like Asians at Dropbox, BlackDropboxers, Latinx, Pridebox (LGBTQ), Vets at Dropbox, Women at Dropbox, ATX Diversity (based in Austin, Texas) and the Dropbox Empowerment Network (based in Dublin, Ireland).', '100% company paid individual medical, dental, & vision insurance coverage', 'You are independent and enjoy working in a fast-paced environment', 'Experience working on/investigating cybercrime, malware, and the underground economy']

strong\xa0communication skills', 'The Reliability System Engineering team is growing and looking for experienced storage engineers. We are looking for passionate and creative individuals that can help grow our testing and test automation framework. The RSE team is responsible primarily for grey box reliability test cases but will also expand into covering white box device testing. As a member of the team, you will be working with various cross functional collaborative environments to develop and grow our SSD test case coverage for bleeding edge enterprise SSD technologies.', 'Preferred qualifications:', 'SK hynix memory solutions America Inc. offers you the opportunity to apply your skills to exciting projects while working with innovative teams. Our compensation package is complimented by a generous benefits package including medical, dental, vision, life insurance and a company 401(k) match, as well as cafeteria, onsite gym and much more. If you are motivated by technical challenges, we offer a collaborative work environment that encourages career growth.\xa0', 'On failure, perform 1st\xa0level\xa0failure analysis using debugging tools\xa0to understand and articulate\xa0failure mode to other engineers', 'Familiarity with RESTful API integration', 'Familiar with database design and languages (SQL)', 'Test case automation and developmentAnalyze product reliability specifications and create new\xa0test cases and\xa0algorithmsDesign and execute test plans (test type, phase,\xa0quantity) to maximize test coverageAnalyze test data collected to provide estimations for product life,\xa0reliability\xa0and predict failure modesOn failure, perform 1st\xa0level\xa0failure analysis using debugging tools\xa0to understand and articulate\xa0failure mode to other engineersWork in cooperation with FW and NAND engineering functions to design new test cases and debug failuresDevelopment of data analysis tools to expand test coverage and failure prediction', 'Analyze product reliability specifications and create new\xa0test cases and\xa0algorithms', 'Experience with\xa0code revision control tools (such as git and Perforce)\u200b\u200b', 'Experience working with volume SSD test system such as\xa0Flexstar, Neosem, Advantest, or UniTest\xa0equipment', "SK hynix memory solutions America Inc. (SKHMS America) provides industry-leading controller hardware, advanced flash management systems, and firmware for NAND and post 2D-NAND based storage solutions spanning Enterprise, Client and Mobile market segments. We are part of the world's top tier semiconductor supplier, SK hynix, offering Dynamic Random Access Memory chips (DRAM), Flash memory chips (NAND Flash) and CMOS Image Sensor (CIS) for a wide range of distinguished customers globally.", 'Design and execute test plans (test type, phase,\xa0quantity) to maximize test coverage', '\u200bExperience with joint qualification\xa0process for enterprise customers\u200b']

['', 'Who You Are:', 'Pega Offers You ', 'Gartner Analyst acclaimed technology leadership across our categories of products', 'You are a proven performer with a solid foundation in the basics of software development, including object-oriented design, Test Driven Development (TDD) and continuous integration. We primarily focus on stateless and scalable execution, in order to support the $1B and growing client base on the Pega Engine. job_title: Sr. Deep Learning Software Engineer, Machine Learning / Computer Vision / NLP
job_text: ['', '•Produce benchmark results. ', 'Desired Skills:', 'Sr. Deep Learning Software Engineer, Machine Learning / Computer Vision / NLP', '•Lead the research of new deep learning algorithms. ', 'Required Skills: ', '•Algorithm design, development, implementation skills. Must make independent decisions and recommendations based on a solid technical background.\xa0 ', '•Attend international conferences, workshops and meetings. ', ' ', 'As part of the R&D team, \xa0the Software Deep Learning Engineer will; ', '•Experience in machine learning, computer vision, NLP, signal processing. ', 'Sr. Deep Learning Software Engineer, Machine Learning / Computer Vision / NLP ', 'Problem Solving: ', '•Good understanding of software architectures and ability to work throughout the software stack. ', '•Produce conference publications and patent applications. ', ' Senior Software Engineer – Deep Learning in the Silicon Valley Laboratory   ', 'A worldwide leader in research of machine learning, robotics and autonomous systems, including drones, robots and autonomous software agents powered by bleeding edge deep-learning algorithms.\xa0\xa0We are constantly striving to improve and grow both personally and professionally. We put our customer first, and demand only the best. We are looking for those that share our passion. ', '•BS in EE/CS with minimum of 3+ years of experience in machine learning and/or signal processing.\xa0•Demonstrated proficiency in Python, C++/C, and Lua. ', 'Please send your resume to jerald.baker@motektech.com', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', 'Desired Skills: ', 'ACCOUNTABILITIES:', 'Problem Solving:', '\xa0 ', '•Write real-time prototypes of the newly designed algorithms. ', '•Excellent knowledge of linear algebra, and statistics. ', '\xa0•Experience of deep learning models / training methodologies (auto-encoders, CNN, DNN, RNN/LSTM).\xa0•Experience with CUDA GPU programming and/or other parallel computing platforms (Open-CL).\xa0•Experience with Deep learning libraries (Theano, Caffe, Chainer, Torch). ', 'The candidate ideally has experience in tuning machine learning models for best performances on heterogeneous data. ', '•Experience working with heterogeneous datasets. ', 'Education & Experience ', 'QUALIFICATIONS: ', '•Experience in large-scale data processing on distributed infrastructure. ', 'ACCOUNTABILITIES: ']

job_title: Senior R / R Shiny Data Visualization Developer
job_text: ['', 'Cytel does not accept referrals from employment businesses and/or employment agencies in respect of the vacancies posted on this site. All employment businesses/agencies are required to contact Cytel’s human resources department to obtain prior written authorization before referring any candidates to Cytel. The obtaining of prior written authorization is a condition precedent to any agreement (verbal or written) between the employment business/ agency and Cytel. In the absence of such written authorization being obtained any actions undertaken by the employment business/agency shall be deemed to have been performed without the consent or contractual agreement of Cytel. Cytel shall therefore not be liable for any fees arising from such actions or any fees arising from any referrals by employment businesses/agencies.', 'What we are looking for:', 'Minimum 5-10 years of \xa0R / R Shiny with standard packages for data visualization and analysis in aid of clinical data review in the Pharmaceutical & Biotech industry ', 'You will have the opportunity to play an integral role helping our clients and the industry shape the future of drug developmentYou will be part of an exciting new chapter in Cytel’s history with high growth and opportunities to progress in Senior and Leadership positions within the company', 'Join us in playing an important part in helping our clients drive healthcare forward and ultimately improve human health outcomes!', 'Knowledge of SAS and SAS Macros and familiarity of CDISC data standards (ADaM / SDTM)', 'Familiarity with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python a plus', 'You will  be involved in generating complex graphs used for statistical analysis and interpretation such as DAG (Directed Acyclic Diagrams) and Sankey plots, among others.  In addition to development of new code, you will support and maintain standard R programs, which will comprise a library of code to be used for future development.', 'Cytel Inc. is an Equal Employment / Affirmative Action Employer. Applicants are considered for all positions without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristics protected by law.', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent, preferably in a scientific discipline such as Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, etc. \xa0Advanced degrees strongly preferred.Minimum 5-10 years of \xa0R / R Shiny with standard packages for data visualization and analysis in aid of clinical data review in the Pharmaceutical & Biotech industry Knowledge of SAS and SAS Macros and familiarity of CDISC data standards (ADaM / SDTM)Proficiency in ggplot2, plotly, dplyr, haven/readxlFamiliarity with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python a plusMust be capable of developing collaborative relationships with colleagues and stakeholdersMust be self-motivated and have strong analytical, interpersonal, and project management skillsMust demonstrate the ability to present ideas, issues, and observations in a clear manner', 'Must demonstrate the ability to present ideas, issues, and observations in a clear manner', 'Work with and leverage the best and brightest minds in the industry', 'You will have the opportunity to play an integral role helping our clients and the industry shape the future of drug developmentYou will be part of an exciting new chapter in Cytel’s history with high growth and opportunities to progress in Senior and Leadership positions within the companyWork in an environment designed for an entrepreneurial minded person with a lot …of energy, ideas and courage for their implementationWork with and leverage the best and brightest minds in the industry', 'Proficiency in ggplot2, plotly, dplyr, haven/readxl', 'As a seasoned R / R Shiny developer, you will work in the Global Biometrics & Data Sciences group and develop applications and tools in support of data visualization and reporting, including the use of R Shiny as the reporting layer, and R and/or SAS for any pre-processing and data manipulation for early development studies.\xa0', 'Must be capable of developing collaborative relationships with colleagues and stakeholders', 'Work in an environment designed for an entrepreneurial minded person with a lot …of energy, ideas and courage for their implementation', 'What’s in it for you:', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent, preferably in a scientific discipline such as Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, etc. \xa0Advanced degrees strongly preferred.', 'Cytel provides unrivalled biostatistics and operations research to improve drug development success rates, crucial for human welfare. Focused on using innovative applications of statistical science and adaptive clinical trial design, Cytel is at the cutting edge of technology and human ingenuity, driving healthcare forward. ', 'Must be self-motivated and have strong analytical, interpersonal, and project management skills', 'We are hiring Principal and Senior R / R Shiny Data Visualization Developers for our Clinical Research Services division.\xa0Position reports to Sr. Director, Biostatistics & Statistical Programming.', 'Your Impact ']

job_text: ['', "2+ years' experience building RESTful API's and enterprise web applications using Java.", 'LOCATION:\xa0\xa0Phoenix, Arizona (100% Remote to Start)', 'DO NOT', "Financial Company in Phoenix, Arizona is looking to hire a Full Stack Java Developer to join their Information Security organization. Although previous cloud development experience is not required to be successful in this role, you will be working heavily within 'secure-cloud' environments such as GCP and AWS. ['', ' Collaborate closely with a creative team of engineers and researchers. Analyze dependencies and interactions in a complex robotic system and creatively overcome limitations of individual components and sensor modalities through orchestration, fusion or design of missing links. Prototype and deploy robust and reliable solutions to cutting-edge perception problems.
