Opportunity to work with Docker Java Spring/Spring Boot with CI/CD concepts.', 'Codeworks L.L.C. is a full-service IT Consulting and Staffing Services company.\xa0Headquartered in Milwaukee, WI with an additional office in Madison, WI—Codeworks has more than 20+ years of experience connecting great people to great companies.\xa0Codeworks services companies nationwide ranging from start-ups to Fortune 100 corporations. Our Recruiting team consists of highly skilled Talent Specialists who excel at evaluating, advising, and connecting IT professionals with new career opportunities that facilitate career growth.\xa0', 'Our major wealth management client through a holistic planning approach combines the expertise of its financial professionals with a personalized digital experience and industry leading products to help its clients, people and businesses, achieve financial security. Recognized by FORTUNE as one of the "World\'s Most Admired" companies in 2020.', '**W2 Consultants only**', '\xa0', 'As a Software Engineer you will develop integrated solutions, modernizing, consolidating and coordinating independently-designed applications to meet business needs. The Software engineer will have a variety of account abilities from development, to working with brokered teams, vendors, business partners, which allows for building relationships in a team setting. The Engineer will help deliver new features and capabilities on an agile team.']

job_title: Fullstack Software Engineer  - UP TO $200K + Equity
job_text: ['', 'Stealth Startup is a Startup that is democratizing access to institutional quality investing resources. We are bringing innovation to an industry that typically has had very little.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Translate product requirements into technical requirements that affect frontend and backend architecture.Actively participate in production discussions to help build cutting-edge solutions.', 'Requirements:', 'Actively participate in production discussions to help build cutting-edge solutions.', 'Stealth Startup is building a modern financial research platform and network. Our aim is to be the center for retail investors to interact with public markets.', '\xa0Stealth Startup has over 100,000 users and over $400 million in assets', 'As a Full Stack Software Engineer, you will have the opportunity to work on a product that is positioned at the heart of the financial ecosystem and that aims to dislodge clunky incumbents. From working with and helping visualize large amounts of real-time data to creating a delightful user experience for investors, you can be a generalist or specialist based on your interests and skills.', 'node.js, react.js, graphql are required.', 'Translate product requirements into technical requirements that affect frontend and backend architecture.', 'About Us', '1-2 years of programming experience', 'Come from top CS program or company/startup', 'The environment is super collaborative, with multiple working sessions each week across engineering, product, and design. While we are building in a serious industry, we are a fun group and always eager to make sure everyone has a real impact on what we are creating together.', 'Two-fold mission: To modernize investment research tools through an intuitive platform that’s easily accessible across all devices, while democratizing access to institutional-quality investing tools that were once only available to Wall Street professionals.”', 'AWS', 'From working with and helping visualize large amounts of real-time data to creating a delightful user experience for investors, you will have the opportunity to be a generalist or specialist based on your interest and rapidly become a key part of a small, but powerful and very fast-moving team.', '1-2 years of programming experiencenode.js, react.js, graphql are required.AWSCome from top CS program or company/startup']

['', 'Excellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)', "Quality focused: you take pride in your codeC / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / workExcellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'Experience with lower level systems programming in C or C++', 'C / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / work', 'Required Skills and Attributes:', 'Quality focused: you take pride in your code', 'Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'About Us:', 'As a Founding Engineer, you will design, implement, and deploy highly distributed, large-scale services. You will translate complex functional and technical requirements into detailed architecture and design. You will be very hands on, and work with others on the engineering team to manage day-to-day development activities, and participate in designs, design reviews, code reviews, and implementation. Our ideal candidate will be passionate about delivering high quality solutions to complex engineering problems, while working within a team.', "Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)', 'Track record of successfully shipping systems software', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)Track record of successfully shipping systems softwareExperience with lower level systems programming in C or C++Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'Application complexity is shooting through the roof, and a large part of the reason is obsolescence of underlying data platforms that were built for centralized and simpler workloads. We are building the next generation data fabric for cloud native applications - where data mobility and portability is a central theme. This vision is matched by the passion of the founding team (with experience at Google, Facebook, and other internet scale companies), and we are recruiting our first engineers that will help establish the direction for the platform and establish the culture for the company.', 'Education and Previous Positions:']

["We're looking for a senior software engineer to join a company in the Underdog.io network.The Underdog.io network is a curated group of some of the fastest growing companies in New York and San Francisco. We actively turn away more than 50% of companies that attempt to join.We accept companies that offer competitive salaries, benefits, and perks. They're working on interesting technical challenges and must be respectful of your time to stay active.Our companies look for senior software engineers proficient in Python or Java. The ideal candidate is motivated by working on complex technical problems and curious about the world around them. Many of our companies are looking for mid-to-senior level talent, both individual contributors and managers.To apply to the network, we'll ask you to fill out a 60-second web form. It's absolutely free.If accepted, you'll hear directly from founders, hiring managers, and other key decision makers starting the following Monday. Our platform will hide your profile from your current employer. To get started, click through to the link and drop your email.--- ", 'Building an inclusive and diverse workplace is one of Underdog.io’s core values. We warmly welcome people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.']

['', 'To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.', 'Academic, professional or internship experience in one of Java, Python, Javascript, HTML, SQL or C++', 'Be a self-starter and possess strong sense of self-motivation', 'Academic, professional or internship experience working in a professional coding setting environment ', 'Work closely with a team of engineers, product managers, user experience experts and performance engineers to build new features our customers will love, adopt and use while keeping our trusted platform stable and scalable', 'Accommodations  - ', 'Analyze, design and develop test cases and implement automated test suites', 'Architect, design, implement, test and deliver highly scalable products', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills', 'Accommodations ', 'Develop test strategies, design automation frameworks, write unit/functional tests to drive up code coverage and automation metrics', 'Experience using telemetry and metrics to drive operational excellence', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or related technical field', 'Salesfore.com', 'Required Skills', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skillsTeam-player with the ability to work effectively and efficiently with othersBe a self-starter and possess strong sense of self-motivationExperience using telemetry and metrics to drive operational excellence', 'Fluency in object-oriented programming/design', ' Want your line of code to have a significant and measurable positive impact for users, the company’s bottom line, and industry? Join Salesforce and define the future of cloud computing. We deliver a scalable, high performance cloud computing platform that delights our customers, and is used by millions of people around the world each day for their business. You will be working with a group of world-class engineers to build breakthrough features that our customers will love, adopt and use while keeping our trusted platform stable and scalable. The software engineer role at Salesforce encompasses architecture, design, implementation, and testing to ensure we build products right and release them with high quality. ', ' From Marketing Cloud to Service Cloud, Platform to IoT, Einstein Platform, Security and everything in between we have many opportunities available across various applications and platforms. Apply now and we look forward to reaching out to you with opportunities that fit your background and interests! ', ' We are looking for the best and brightest new college graduates to join our team of world class, highly motivated software engineers and cloud computing experts. You will have a chance to be mentored and network with senior levels at Salesforce, and be a part of a year long new graduate program with various targeted events throughout the year. ', 'Job Category', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or related technical fieldAcademic, professional or internship experience working in a professional coding setting environment Fluency in object-oriented programming/designAcademic, professional or internship experience in one of Java, Python, Javascript, HTML, SQL or C++', 'With offices all over the world, our recruits have the chance to collaborate and connect with fellow employees on a global scale. We offer job shadowing, mentorship programs, talent development courses, and much more.', 'Architect, design, implement, test and deliver highly scalable productsMaster our development process, culture and code base, then improve itWork closely with a team of engineers, product managers, user experience experts and performance engineers to build new features our customers will love, adopt and use while keeping our trusted platform stable and scalableDevelop test strategies, design automation frameworks, write unit/functional tests to drive up code coverage and automation metricsAnalyze, design and develop test cases and implement automated test suites', 'Posting Statement', 'Salesforce.org', 'Job Details', 'Salesforce.com', 'Our Futureforce University Recruiting program is dedicated to attracting, retaining and cultivating talent. Our interns and new graduates work on real projects that affect how our business runs, giving them the opportunity to make a tangible impact on the future of our company.', 'About Futureforce University Recruiting', 'Team-player with the ability to work effectively and efficiently with others', 'Desired Skills', 'Master our development process, culture and code base, then improve it', 'Key Responsibilities']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Machine Learning Training Platform
job_text: ['', 'Monthly wellness stipend ', ' High-quality individual and family medical, dental, and vision insurance Competitive compensation packages Employer-matched 401(k) retirement plan with immediate vesting Employer-paid group term life insurance and the option to elect voluntary life insurance  Paid parental leave  Paid medical leave Unlimited vacation Complimentary daily lunches, beverages, and snacks Pre-tax commuter benefits Monthly wellness stipend  Professional development reimbursement Employee assistance program Discounted programs that include legal services, identity theft protection, pet insurance, and more Company and team bonding outlets: employee resource groups, quarterly team activity stipend, and wellness initiatives ', 'Strong team player who can collaborate effectively with others', 'Paid medical leave', 'What You’ll Do', ' Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Robotics or a related field Strong team player who can collaborate effectively with others Experience building highly scalable, reliable, and maintainable data systems/Machine Learning pipelines Experience delivering software and systems that support Machine Learning, Deep Learning, or both Experience working as a lead or Senior level Software Engineer Strong programming skills in relevant languages (Python, C++, Java, scripting), associated tools & frameworks Experience working with cloud-based infrastructure platforms (such as AWS, Azure, or GCP)  Ability to build new software systems from scratch and implement off the shelf / open source frameworks depending on the need Strong presentation and communication skills  ', 'What We Offer You', 'Knowledge of cross platform build tools (eg. Bazel, Maven, etc.)', 'Employer-matched 401(k) retirement plan with immediate vesting', 'Working knowledge of large scale data processing tools (e.g. Spark, Beam, Hadoop ecosystem, etc.) and workflow orchestration tools (e.g. Airflow, Kubeflow, Oozie, Conductor, Azkaban, etc.)', 'Experience building highly scalable, reliable, and maintainable data systems/Machine Learning pipelines', 'Our Background', 'Strong programming skills in relevant languages (Python, C++, Java, scripting), associated tools & frameworks', 'Ability to build new software systems from scratch and implement off the shelf / open source frameworks depending on the need', 'Paid parental leave ', 'Working proficiency with containers and orchestration frameworks like Docker and Kubernetes', 'Employer-paid group term life insurance and the option to elect voluntary life insurance ', 'Unlimited vacation', 'Meet The Team', 'Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Robotics or a related field', "What You'll Need To Succeed", 'Experience working with cloud-based infrastructure platforms (such as AWS, Azure, or GCP) ', 'Company and team bonding outlets: employee resource groups, quarterly team activity stipend, and wellness initiatives', 'Professional development reimbursement', 'Experience working as a lead or Senior level Software Engineer', ' Working knowledge of large scale data processing tools (e.g. Spark, Beam, Hadoop ecosystem, etc.) and workflow orchestration tools (e.g. Airflow, Kubeflow, Oozie, Conductor, Azkaban, etc.) Working proficiency with containers and orchestration frameworks like Docker and Kubernetes Knowledge of cross platform build tools (eg. Bazel, Maven, etc.) ', 'Strong presentation and communication skills ', 'Participate in code and architecture reviews', 'Pre-tax commuter benefits', 'Work with cloud, deployment, and Machine Learning technologies (AWS, GCP, TensorFlow, Kubernetes, Docker, etc.)', 'Provide training and support to empower users of our platform', 'High-quality individual and family medical, dental, and vision insurance', 'The Machine Learning Training Platform team is responsible for delivering the platform and services needed to train and deploy the various Machine Learning models used at Argo AI. We serve the Machine Learning needs of multiple teams, including on-vehicle Autonomy teams as well as off-vehicle teams. We are hiring Senior Software Engineers who will own the engineering and support of the Machine Learning Training Platform and related tooling. This is a high impact team that will provide the opportunity to learn about, interact with, and add significant value to every team building Machine Learning models at Argo, and support our goal of building safe and efficient self-driving vehicles.', 'Automate the build, test, deployment, monitoring and support of software deliverables', 'Competitive compensation packages', 'Follow and promote Software Engineering and Machine Learning best practices across the organization', 'Experience delivering software and systems that support Machine Learning, Deep Learning, or both', 'Full-stack software development in Python and related frameworks / tools', 'Own initiatives from inception to implementation', 'Employee assistance program', 'Discounted programs that include legal services, identity theft protection, pet insurance, and more', 'Architect, implement, and support our Machine Learning Platform and associated tooling', 'Collaborate with internal customers to define and deliver features and tools', 'Complimentary daily lunches, beverages, and snacks', 'Who We Are', 'Nice To Haves', ' Architect, implement, and support our Machine Learning Platform and associated tooling Collaborate with internal customers to define and deliver features and tools Automate the build, test, deployment, monitoring and support of software deliverables Own initiatives from inception to implementation Provide training and support to empower users of our platform Participate in code and architecture reviews Follow and promote Software Engineering and Machine Learning best practices across the organization Work with cloud, deployment, and Machine Learning technologies (AWS, GCP, TensorFlow, Kubernetes, Docker, etc.) Full-stack software development in Python and related frameworks / tools ']

['', ' Design and communicate coding standards, architectural plans, solve complex design and architectural problems, create robust architectural solutions.', 'Job Responsibilities', ' Proven background as an architect and designer of service oriented enterprise applications', ' Provide technical expertise and leadership in the design, development, and delivery of medical and business applications, while adhering to timelines, coding standards, requirements, and quality. Architect, design, develop, test, troubleshoot, debug, optimize, scale, maintain and improve software applications, driving the delivery of high quality value. Develop functional and technical specifications, and test plans. Review others’ code. Develop and document functional and technical requirements. Collaborate with other team members and other teams on all of the above. Design and communicate coding standards, architectural plans, solve complex design and architectural problems, create robust architectural solutions. Implement, refine, and enforce software development techniques to ensure that delivered features meet software integration, performance, security, and maintainability expectations. Research, test, benchmark, and evaluate new tools and technologies, and recommend ways to implement them in product development. Maintain high standards of software quality and technical excellence within the team by establishing good practices and habits and writing clean, testable, maintainable, and secure code. Inspire a forward-thinking team of developers, acting as an agent of change and evangelist for a quality-first culture within the organization. Mentor and coach team members and guide them to solutions on complex design issues. Proactively identify issues, bottlenecks, gaps, or other areas of concern or opportunity and work to either directly affect change, or advocate for that change by working with peers and leadership to build consensus and take action. Perform critical maintenance, deployment, and release support activities, including occasional off-hours support. Adaptable team player with strong collaboration skills and a focus on results and value delivery. Passion for engineering excellence, curiosity and demonstrated ability of continuous learning.', ' Implement, refine, and enforce software development techniques to ensure that delivered features meet software integration, performance, security, and maintainability expectations.', ' 5+ years of experience in Microsoft SQL Server and working with large databases', ' Must have strong focus on user experience and design', ' Must be able to own and execute multiple simultaneous projects', ' Must be a technology enthusiast with broad technical knowledge and curiosity to learn', ' Adaptable team player with strong collaboration skills and a focus on results and value delivery.', ' Healthcare and/or Health Insurance experience is preferred but not required', 'Job Requirements', ' Provide technical expertise and leadership in the design, development, and delivery of medical and business applications, while adhering to timelines, coding standards, requirements, and quality.', ' Inspire a forward-thinking team of developers, acting as an agent of change and evangelist for a quality-first culture within the organization. job_title: Software Engineer w/ AI / AR Start up || Mountain View
job_text: ['', 'Opportunity to work in a dynamic R&D team of software developers, computer vision, AI, computational photography, AR, and graphics professionals. ', 'Experience with the Google Cloud Platform and its core services. ', 'Experience with Kubernetes. ', 'Our client is crafting advanced AI algorithms into exciting consumer experiences for a well-known and beloved global brand, with hundreds of millions of users.They have an opening for a high-impact backend engineer who is excited to craft cloud services and web apps for our AI pipelines and consumer app. This could be a great opportunity for an ambitious, hands-on, backend engineer interested in mass-scale platforms, machine learning, 3D vision and mobile apps.   ', 'Requirements', 'Create new cloud services, features, and APIs to power our web & mobile products. Design and develop backend systems and infrastructure. ', 'Benefits ', 'Design and develop backend systems and infrastructure. ', 'Responsibilities ']

['', 'Qualifications:', 'Exposure to Computer Science and Engineering as a discipline. A BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science or equivalent experience5+ years of industry experience in a high level language. We work predominantly in Python and Javascript .5+ years of industry experience working with web application development. We use Django as a web framework and React for front end development.Relational database experience. We use PostgreSQL.Experience with Unix, Git, and other command line tools.Demonstrated experience with development processes and tools.Strong software engineering fundamentals: design, testing, version control', 'Write and perform integration tests with real and simulated devices.', 'Our in-house developed software includes a laboratory information management system (LIMS), scheduling software that can run any type of lab automation workcell , and web-apps that control our automation equipment. We use modern web technologies including Python, Django, React, and Postgres.', 'Interface with other teams to develop software requirements. We work with hardware engineers, assay development scientists, production lab scientists, bioinformaticians, maintenance engineers, and more.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Exposure to Computer Science and Engineering as a discipline. A BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science or equivalent experience', 'No background in genomics/lab automation is required! Though our engineers find the application of our software interesting, solving these problems fundamentally requires software solutions. We’re looking for great software engineers - strong generalists with solid CS fundamentals and practical software engineering intuition - to help us scale up genomics to millions of users.', 'Myriad is a genetic screening and testing company. Our genetic screens provide actionable information, empowering women and their families to make critical and timely healthcare decisions, whether they’re thinking about starting a family or evaluating risk for cancer. Find out more at www.myriadwomenshealth.com', '5+ years of industry experience working with web application development. We use Django as a web framework and React for front end development.', 'Our tests are powered by an automated sequencing lab and software that truly covers the full technology stack: robotics, automation, scientific compute, data pipelines, variant calling/interpretation (bioinformatics), data visualization, risk calculations (population genetics), electronic medical records (EMR), patient and doctor user experience (UX), and solving key workflow problems in large complex health systems. This technology stack enables us to provide actionable information to almost a million patients per year.', 'Demonstrated experience with development processes and tools.', '5+ years of industry experience in a high level language. We work predominantly in Python and Javascript .', 'Strong software engineering fundamentals: design, testing, version control', 'Here are some of the tasks our automation team is responsible for:', 'Design, implementation, test, deployment, and maintenance of the service oriented software stack s that runs our lab.', 'Design, implementation, test, deployment, and maintenance of the service oriented software stack s that runs our lab.Make design decisions involving overall system architecture and implementation patterns to ensure future reliability, scalability and flexibility of our laboratory operations.Write and perform integration tests with real and simulated devices.Interface with other teams to develop software requirements. We work with hardware engineers, assay development scientists, production lab scientists, bioinformaticians, maintenance engineers, and more.Identify opportunities for productivity and quality improvements in the software engineering practices and designs', 'The software automation team is responsible for building software tools to support our highly automated production sequencing lab. We work closely with hardware engineers and molecular biology scientists to build automated workcells using the most advanced industrial automation and lab automation equipment available. Our software supports the simultaneous processing of thousands of samples across multiple workflows and our workcells run 24/7.', 'Relational database experience. We use PostgreSQL.', 'Experience with Unix, Git, and other command line tools.', 'Make design decisions involving overall system architecture and implementation patterns to ensure future reliability, scalability and flexibility of our laboratory operations.', '>>> REMOTE Position ( up to 10% travel) <<<', 'Identify opportunities for productivity and quality improvements in the software engineering practices and designs']

['', 'We know this industry is complex. That’s why we invest in education starting day one with Flexport Academy, a one week intensive onboarding program designed specifically to set every new Flexport employee up for success.', 'Platform that enables dynamic pricing, service selection and pricing optimization.', 'An aptitude for learning quickly.', 'What’s freight forwarding and why does it matter? Freight forwarding is the coordination and shipment of goods from one place to another and it’s what makes global trade possible. Flexport is on a mission to make global trade easier for everyone because we believe it can help connect the world and break down economic barriers.', 'A love of simple, well-tested code that is easy to extend and hard to break.', 'Bring trade to everyone in the world.', 'Build the first modern logistics platform', 'Think big picture, dive deep into the domain and communicate the architecture of Marketplace systems to technical and non-technical stakeholders.', 'Worried about not having any freight forwarding experience?', 'Engineering Culture And Values', 'The Opportunity', 'Don’t be! We’re building the first Operating System for Global Trade. That’s why it’s incredibly important for us to bring people from diverse backgrounds and experiences together with our industry veterans to help move the freight forwarding industry forward.', 'Determine and model the data structures that represent the services we procure and sell.', ' 8+ years of experience writing software, and a strong engineering background. Experience as a generalist working on both the frontend and backend to provide the best solutions for users. A love of simple, well-tested code that is easy to extend and hard to break. A bias for action. When you see a problem, you solve it. The ability to convey technical ideas in common terms to business partners, product managers, designers and engineers alike. Effectively and reliably delivers large projects, including breaking the projects down into smaller pieces. An aptitude for learning quickly. Optional: experience in Java, Ruby, Rails, Node.js, React, GraphQL, PostgreSQL ', 'What You’ll Build', 'Experience as a generalist working on both the frontend and backend to provide the best solutions for users.', 'About Flexport', 'You Should Have', 'Effectively and reliably delivers large projects, including breaking the projects down into smaller pieces.', 'Independently architects and leads major projects which have a significant amount of complexity and cross functional dependencies.', 'Mentor and coach relatively junior engineers in the team to write modular, testable code and design scalable solutions.', ' Determine and model the data structures that represent the services we procure and sell. Platform that enables dynamic pricing, service selection and pricing optimization. Automate workflows and build data pipelines which will enable our Pricing Ops to manage services in the catalog better. Bring trade to everyone in the world. ', '8+ years of experience writing software, and a strong engineering background.', 'Build and launch products rapidly and incrementally. We ship to production dozens of times per day.', 'A bias for action. When you see a problem, you solve it.', 'Design systems that represent the real-world intricacies of logistics entities, such as services, routing, transit times, and pricing.', ' Independently architects and leads major projects which have a significant amount of complexity and cross functional dependencies. Think big picture, dive deep into the domain and communicate the architecture of Marketplace systems to technical and non-technical stakeholders. Design systems that represent the real-world intricacies of logistics entities, such as services, routing, transit times, and pricing. Build and launch products rapidly and incrementally. We ship to production dozens of times per day. Work closely with business partners, product managers and design to distill complex business problems into elegant technical solutions. Mentor and coach relatively junior engineers in the team to write modular, testable code and design scalable solutions. Craft the engineering vision, and own the technical landscape, for a major domain in the world of logistics that powers global trade. ', ' Don’t be! We’re building the first Operating System for Global Trade. That’s why it’s incredibly important for us to bring people from diverse backgrounds and experiences together with our industry veterans to help move the freight forwarding industry forward. What’s freight forwarding and why does it matter? Freight forwarding is the coordination and shipment of goods from one place to another and it’s what makes global trade possible. Flexport is on a mission to make global trade easier for everyone because we believe it can help connect the world and break down economic barriers. We know this industry is complex. That’s why we invest in education starting day one with Flexport Academy, a one week intensive onboarding program designed specifically to set every new Flexport employee up for success. ', 'Craft the engineering vision, and own the technical landscape, for a major domain in the world of logistics that powers global trade.', 'The ability to convey technical ideas in common terms to business partners, product managers, designers and engineers alike.', 'You Will', 'Optional: experience in Java, Ruby, Rails, Node.js, React, GraphQL, PostgreSQL', 'Our Stack', 'Automate workflows and build data pipelines which will enable our Pricing Ops to manage services in the catalog better.', 'Work closely with business partners, product managers and design to distill complex business problems into elegant technical solutions.']

job_title: Sr Principal Software Engineer (Control Plane Consumer Product)
job_text: ['', 'The Team ', 'Innovate, design, and develop the control plane of a new consumer oriented network appliance product, working on configuration, policy, policy enforcement, communications with cloud, etc.', 'Additional Preferred Experiences', 'Teammate who brings a can-do attitude to a dynamic working environment.', 'Deliver the product’s core features in high quality and performance. ', 'Palo Alto Networks®', 'Our Mission', 'Experience with developing network appliance’s components for policy, iptables, telemetry, logs, configuration. ', 'Experience with large-scale and/or high-performance software design and development.Experience with developing network appliance’s components for policy, iptables, telemetry, logs, configuration. Experience and knowledge on WebSocket, gRPC, SSL/TLS.Knowledge of the control plane design paradigm of industry, like API Server of Kubernetes.Experience in embedded system development. Familiar with shell script, Python, and/or Go programming.', 'Experience and knowledge on WebSocket, gRPC, SSL/TLS.', 'Expertise on multi-threading programming, IPC and memory management on Linux.', 'Knowledge of the control plane design paradigm of industry, like API Server of Kubernetes.', 'Experience in embedded system development. ', 'Familiar with shell script, Python, and/or Go programming.', 'Familiar with TCP/IP networking and Linux network management. ', 'Experience with large-scale and/or high-performance software design and development.', 'Clearly communicate goals and desired outcomes to internal project teams', 'B.S. degree in Computer Science, similar technical discipline or equivalent practical experience, Graduate degree (MS or Ph.D.) in Computer Science or similar technical discipline is preferred.Proficient in C/C++ and familiar with the Linux development environment. Familiar with common data structure & algorithms.Experience on control plane development for network appliance or security appliance. Expertise on multi-threading programming, IPC and memory management on Linux.Familiar with TCP/IP networking and Linux network management. Verbal and written communication skills to work with multi-functional groups.Teammate who brings a can-do attitude to a dynamic working environment.', 'Experience on control plane development for network appliance or security appliance. ', 'Your Career', 'Verbal and written communication skills to work with multi-functional groups.', 'Own and be responsible for multiple components in the system and invent them from scratch.', 'Our Commitment', 'Innovate, design, and develop the control plane of a new consumer oriented network appliance product, working on configuration, policy, policy enforcement, communications with cloud, etc.Own and be responsible for multiple components in the system and invent them from scratch.Deliver the product’s core features in high quality and performance. Contribute in all phases of the product development cycle, from definition, design, through implementation, integration and test.Suggest and implement improvements to the development processClearly communicate goals and desired outcomes to internal project teams', 'Job Description', 'Proficient in C/C++ and familiar with the Linux development environment. ['', 'CS, Software Engineering or an equivalent degree or equivalent work experience. Four or more years working in an engineering domain relevant to the listed responsibilities. Familiar with the modern .NET ecosystem outside of Unity. A proven track record of working on a shipped product operating successfully at scale.', 'Required Skills:', 'Company Description:', '"Stealth Startup" is an AR/VR Startup looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our small team of world-class engineers. This role carries responsibility for the ongoing development and live support of Supernatural, the innovative and ambitious home fitness solution for the Oculus Quest. The impact you’ll make: As a Senior Software Engineer you’ll be a force-multiplier working across a spectrum of client-side work including substantial integration with backend services, optimizing for mobile hardware, and continuous integration including build server configuration and unit testing. Along with deep and broad software development expertise, the ideal candidate will bring a passion for mentoring teammates and reviewing others’ code to help constantly raise the bar.', 'Professional Unity or Unreal development experience ', 'Responsibilities:', 'Nice to haves:', 'Professional Unity or Unreal development experience and expertise with C++/C# Low-level systems, multithreading, and asynchronous networking experience Understanding of the Android ecosystem, profiling, and debugging of Android apps.', 'First and foremost, help us deliver innovative solutions to drive the advancement of our products at scale Stay informed on and adapt to a rapidly evolving software and hardware ecosystem Deliver stable, high-performance code on time and to spec, reviewing and maintaining code quality across the team Actively participate in engineering process improvement discussions Mentor team members as appropriate']

["We're looking for a senior software engineer to join a company in the Underdog.io network.The Underdog.io network is a curated group of some of the fastest growing companies in New York and San Francisco. We actively turn away more than 50% of companies that attempt to join.We accept companies that offer competitive salaries, benefits, and perks. They're working on interesting technical challenges and must be respectful of your time to stay active.Our companies look for senior software engineers proficient in Python or Java. The ideal candidate is motivated by working on complex technical problems and curious about the world around them. Many of our companies are looking for mid-to-senior level talent, both individual contributors and managers.To apply to the network, we'll ask you to fill out a 60-second web form. It's absolutely free.If accepted, you'll hear directly from founders, hiring managers, and other key decision makers starting the following Monday. Our platform will hide your profile from your current employer. To get started, click through to the link and drop your email.--- ", 'Building an inclusive and diverse workplace is one of Underdog.io’s core values. We warmly welcome people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.']

['', 'Excellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)', "Quality focused: you take pride in your codeC / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / workExcellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'Experience with lower level systems programming in C or C++', 'C / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / work', 'Required Skills and Attributes:', 'Quality focused: you take pride in your code', 'Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'About Us:', 'As a Founding Engineer, you will design, implement, and deploy highly distributed, large-scale services. You will translate complex functional and technical requirements into detailed architecture and design. You will be very hands on, and work with others on the engineering team to manage day-to-day development activities, and participate in designs, design reviews, code reviews, and implementation. Our ideal candidate will be passionate about delivering high quality solutions to complex engineering problems, while working within a team.', "Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)', 'Track record of successfully shipping systems software', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)Track record of successfully shipping systems softwareExperience with lower level systems programming in C or C++Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'Application complexity is shooting through the roof, and a large part of the reason is obsolescence of underlying data platforms that were built for centralized and simpler workloads. We are building the next generation data fabric for cloud native applications - where data mobility and portability is a central theme. This vision is matched by the passion of the founding team (with experience at Google, Facebook, and other internet scale companies), and we are recruiting our first engineers that will help establish the direction for the platform and establish the culture for the company.', 'Education and Previous Positions:']

['', 'Restaurant or retail experience a plus', 'We are working hard to make the service workers of the future more enjoyable and less demanding.\xa0We are looking for great colleagues who will realize our mission together.', 'You would be responsible for developing navigation and control methodologies to improve our robot movements in the restaurant environment.Solid experience of indoor mobile robot navigation and localizationSolid knowledge of control and navigation theory', 'You would be responsible for developing navigation and control methodologies to improve our robot movements in the restaurant environment.', 'Qualifications', 'Solid experience of indoor mobile robot navigation and localization', 'Preferred Experience: ROS, navigation stack', 'Responsibilities', 'Proficiency in Linux', 'Experts in C++ and Python', 'Team player', 'The Stealth startup was established in Silicon Valley, USA in May 2017.\xa0We\xa0are making\xa0indoor autonomous robots\xa0that\xa0can help employees serving food in restaurants.\xa0As of 2020, in recognition of its excellent technology and execution ability, it has attracted a total of $32 million in Series A investment from Softbank, Lotte Accelerator, Smilegate, and DSC Investment.', 'Passion for robots and food', 'Solid knowledge of control and navigation theory', 'MS or Ph.D.\xa0degree in Robotics or related fieldProficiency in LinuxExperts in C++ and PythonPreferred Experience: ROS, navigation stackPassion for robots and foodTeam playerRestaurant or retail experience a plus', 'MS or Ph.D.\xa0degree in Robotics or related field']

", 'A Bachelors in Computer Science or equivalent four year degree', 'The Opportunity', 'Our current infrastructure consists of Java, Apache, Tomcat, Memcached, ActiveMQ, and MySQL', "Have meaningful ownership. ['', 'Conceive, design, and build infrastructure tooling that improves reliability across the entire product surface area, dealing with massive distributed scale', 'Embed on product and infrastructure teams directly to build more reliable, scalable software', 'What We’re Looking For', ' Experience with SRE culture, improving reliability with automation, chaos testing, and process improvement Experience designing and operating distributed systems and cloud infrastructure at scale Experience working collaboratively with other engineering teams Interest or experience implementing and iterating on process to improve outcomes with minimal disruption to team culture Interest or experience working across multiple stakeholders to drive effective change ', 'About The Team', 'Help product and infrastructure teams hold retroactive root cause analysis meetings, focusing on identifying remediations using a blameless process similar to the 5 whys methodology', 'Proactively identify risks and advocate for engineering process, tooling, or work streams that reduce that risk in a customer centric way', 'Experience designing and operating distributed systems and cloud infrastructure at scale', "Confidence can sometimes hold us back from applying for a job. But we'll let you in on a secret: there's no such thing as the 'perfect' candidate. HubSpot is a place where everyone can grow. So however you identify and whatever background you bring with you, please apply if this is a role that would make you excited to come into work every day.", 'Interest or experience working across multiple stakeholders to drive effective change', 'What You’ll Do', 'Evangelize best practices around reliability engineering', 'Experience with SRE culture, improving reliability with automation, chaos testing, and process improvement', ' Help product and infrastructure teams hold retroactive root cause analysis meetings, focusing on identifying remediations using a blameless process similar to the 5 whys methodology Embed on product and infrastructure teams directly to build more reliable, scalable software Conceive, design, and build infrastructure tooling that improves reliability across the entire product surface area, dealing with massive distributed scale Evangelize best practices around reliability engineering Proactively identify risks and advocate for engineering process, tooling, or work streams that reduce that risk in a customer centric way ', 'Experience working collaboratively with other engineering teams', 'Interest or experience implementing and iterating on process to improve outcomes with minimal disruption to team culture']

['', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'Conduct research, spikes, design, prototyping and other innovation, exploration and learning activities. ', 'EEO is the Law', 'Overview Of Position', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ', '4+ years professional experience in software development', 'Cloud application development, including serverless and containerized in AWSProficiency in developing objected-oriented software, with deep experience in one or more relevant languagesExperience building complex software systems that have been successfully delivered to customers, using microservices, loosely coupled architectureExperience with agile program management methodologies. Willingness to own all stages of development process: requirements, design, implementation, testing, and operational supportUse software engineering best practices to ensure a high standard of qualityThe ability to clearly and concisely communicate with technical and non-technical customers in order to understand ambiguous problems and articulate technical obstacles and solutions to complex challenges.', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'Experience with agile program management methodologies. ', "Equivalent experience to a Bachelor's degree based on 3 years of work experience for every 1 year of education", 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field', 'General office demands', 'What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?', 'Proficiency in developing objected-oriented software, with deep experience in one or more relevant languages', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Willingness to own all stages of development process: requirements, design, implementation, testing, and operational support', 'Experience building complex software systems that have been successfully delivered to customers, using microservices, loosely coupled architecture', 'What are the requirements needed for this position?', 'Help the team succeed in delivering potentially releasable and production ready software artifacts in every iteration.', 'The ability to clearly and concisely communicate with technical and non-technical customers in order to understand ambiguous problems and articulate technical obstacles and solutions to complex challenges.', 'Eliminate distractions, impediments and wasteful work to optimize flow and velocity.', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'Use software engineering best practices to ensure a high standard of quality', '2+ years professional experience with indexed data persistence such as Relational Databases (SQL) or NoSQL Data Stores', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', '2+ years professional experience with at least two modern programming language such as C++, Java or Python', 'Trunk based development - commit new or modified code reviewed to the shared source code repository and master trunk daily. ', 'Participate in continuous improvement of the software itself, team’s process, CI/CD and development environments, including infrastructure as code.', 'Pair with another Cloud Engineer when appropriate to develop code and associated automatic tests.', 'Design, test, code and deliver high quality secure production software with completely automated tests suitable for cloud deployment at scale. Develop automated tests (TDD including unit, integration, smoke, acceptance tests) to achieve test coverage for continuous deployment and near 100% availability. Execute acceptance tests and maintain test artifacts in a shared repository. Add new tests when fixing defects.', 'Cloud application development, including serverless and containerized in AWS', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Design, test, code and deliver high quality secure production software with completely automated tests suitable for cloud deployment at scale. Develop automated tests (TDD including unit, integration, smoke, acceptance tests) to achieve test coverage for continuous deployment and near 100% availability. Execute acceptance tests and maintain test artifacts in a shared repository. Add new tests when fixing defects.Collaborate with Tech Lead (TL) Cloud Engineer and Product Owner (PO) to refine user stories and acceptance criteria. Work with PO to confirm that the code and acceptance tests reflect the desired functionality. Work in small deliverable batches < 1 week to DOD. Participate in planning and in committing to team and individual objectives. Conduct research, spikes, design, prototyping and other innovation, exploration and learning activities. Trunk based development - commit new or modified code reviewed to the shared source code repository and master trunk daily. Pair with another Cloud Engineer when appropriate to develop code and associated automatic tests.Participate in continuous improvement of the software itself, team’s process, CI/CD and development environments, including infrastructure as code.Eliminate distractions, impediments and wasteful work to optimize flow and velocity.Use feature toggles, multi-versioning, short lived branches and other techniques to keep the trunk working and always deployable.Help the team succeed in delivering potentially releasable and production ready software artifacts in every iteration.', 'Use feature toggles, multi-versioning, short lived branches and other techniques to keep the trunk working and always deployable.', "Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related fieldEquivalent experience to a Bachelor's degree based on 3 years of work experience for every 1 year of education4+ years professional experience in software development2+ years professional experience with at least two modern programming language such as C++, Java or Python2+ years professional experience with indexed data persistence such as Relational Databases (SQL) or NoSQL Data Stores", 'Collaborate with Tech Lead (TL) Cloud Engineer and Product Owner (PO) to refine user stories and acceptance criteria. Work with PO to confirm that the code and acceptance tests reflect the desired functionality. Work in small deliverable batches < 1 week to DOD. Participate in planning and in committing to team and individual objectives. ']

job_text: ['', ' Solutions ', ' Investors ', ' Engineering blog ', 'Product Data Scientist - Ads Data Science', ' Forums ', 'Ability to thrive in an unstructured environment, working autonomously on a strong team to find opportunity and deliver business impact', 'Application', 'Voluntary Information', 'Experience performing analysis on raw event data in modern data warehouse systems', ' Careers ', 'Experience using data intelligently to optimize product performanceExperience performing analysis on raw event data in modern data warehouse systemsDeep understanding of data platforms in which you’ve previously workedGood understanding of how to grow and shape data tools and datasets to improve data-driven decision makingAbility to thrive in an unstructured environment, working autonomously on a strong team to find opportunity and deliver business impactGood understanding of (one or more of the following) Python or R', '  Using Twitter   Managing your account   Safety and security   Rules and policies   Contact us  ', "  This page and certain other Twitter sites place and read third party cookies on your browser that are used for non-essential purposes including targeting of ads. Twitter is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, veteran, genetic information, marital status or any other legally protected status.San Francisco applicants Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.Engineering hiring processStep 1Once your application is received, a recruiter will reach out pending your qualifications are a match for the role.Step 2If your background is a match, you may have 1-2 technical phone interviews or be given the chance to provide a work sample depending on the role.Step 3If the phone interviews go well or your work sample is strong, the final step includes interviews with 5-6 people via a video conference call.ApplicationRead Twitter's Applicant and Candidate Privacy Policy here .U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity information (Completion is voluntary)Voluntary InformationPrivacy and dataProduct Data Scientist - Ads Data Science Locations San Francisco, Remote US, New York CityAdditional InformationWe are committed to an inclusive and diverse Twitter. You will perform rigorous analysis, understand our advertising products, experiment, make data-driven decisions, optimize for impact, and measure performance funnels.Your team will empower you with the autonomy to make good product decisions and discover/understand the software and product stack. You’ll own significant projects end-to-end. The small teams of talented, passionate people in which you’ll work will include engineers and data scientists from across the revenue engineering organization.
